name: Stay-Awhile  at Lovers Pt. Pacific Grv
description:
Vintage cottage located in the heartbeat of Pacific Grove...one block from the rec trail as well as Lighthouse Avenue, Farmers Market and the Natural History Museum.

The space
Very charming and artistic little house located near one of California's most beautiful locations in historic Pacific Grove. Available for longer stays, this house was photographed for Carmel Magazine in Feb.09 for its Pacific Grove edition. An easy one block walk to many restaurants, coffee shops, antique shops,movie theater, farmers market, natural history museum, golf and the beach. Two blocks from Lover's Point Park, Caledonia park, beach and the coastal recreation trail where you can bike or rent surreys, kayaks and paddleboards. This small Cottage has One bedroom with French antique bed, down comforter, crystal chandelier and mirrored dresser ,kitchen has been updated recently with new kitchen appliances and a sunny coffee spot or reading nook. House has hardwood flooring. Comfy cou
neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
I love living near the ocean here in Pacific Grove and walk daily with my dogs on the beach.I am a hair stylist and own a salon in Carmel, I own and renovate old houses and love to travel to tropical places. I enjoy walking to great restaurants and the  Farmer's market all within two blocks. This is the perfect location!
I hope your wanderings lead you to places you love.

name: Ocean front 6-bedroom masterpiece
description:
In May 2015, Trip Advisor chose Pacific Grove as one of the top scenic destinations in all of the United States! We are very proud of this honor, and it came from reviews by guests who stayed at my home and others in town. You will love it here! We operate with Pacific Grove Transient Use License #468.

The space
No need to fight over who gets the ocean view in this fabulous 6-bedroom, 4-bath home! With 270 degrees of blue-water views, four of the bedrooms have full views of the Pacific and Monterey Bay. The fifth and sixth bedrooms have a quiet, courtyard view just in case somebody doesn't like to go to sleep to the sound of the waves, or watch the moon sinking into the sea at night.
We are minutes from Carmel and Cannery Row in Monterey, and Pebble Beach is our neighbor.
We have a fully stocked gourmet kitchen - and the cook gets an ocean view, too. Dining table seats 10, 14 with extension. Foosball, pinball, Legos, ping pong and lots of
neighborhood_overview:
I call Pacific Grove "Iowa with a Beach". It is a really friendly small town with everything you need within 1 mile of the house. We have a lovely Farmers Market, Natural History Museum, Movie Theater, shops, restaurants, wildlife and butterflies!
In May 2015, Trip Advisor chose Pacific Grove as one of the top 12 Scenic Destinations in all of the United States. You will love it here!
host_about: I love sharing my home with families on vacation, enjoying a reunion or celebrating a special event. 2022 begins my 12th year hosting guests, and I am very grateful to all of you who come back year after year!

name: Pet-Friendly* Cottage Near Beach for 30+ day stays
description:
Our quaint, thoughtfully-stocked 300 sq ft cottage is located steps from the ocean, yet tucked away behind our home, affording guests ample privacy, easy parking and all the amenities of home. Sip wine on the patio after a day of adventures while listening to the surf, and sleep soundly on our king Saatva Organic hybrid mattress.

The space
Our 1 bed/1 bath, studio-style cottage is offered fully furnished with kitchenette, organic fair trade coffee, selection of teas, and cooking basics (like oils and spices) provided. Cleaning services and refreshed linens offered weekly, and included in the monthly price.

Please note: we gutted the kitchenette in 2018 and it now has 2 gas burners for cooking, a sink, and fridge. Due to the small space and limited availability of petite-sized appliances, we no longer have an oven or freezer. In place of an oven, we provide a well-rated Breville countertop oven, which is large enough to roast a turkey, make a pizza
neighborhood_overview: Hands down, the best part about our 'hood is the proximity to the ocean.  You can (usually) hear it, and smell it from our house, and see its amazing beauty within a brief walk.  On a clear night, the sunsets are breathtaking.
host_about:
I’m a late-thirties gent that loves to hit the road.  My passion for birdwatching has taken me all over the world.  While I adore international adventures, I also regularly road trip throughout the beautiful west.  I have a 7 year old, plus an toddler, and enjoy exploring the world through their eyes.

My interests include cooking/dining, birdwatching, nature, travel, animals, wine, hiking, and I’m a big fan of the tv shows Curb Your Enthusiasm, Chef's Table, and Top Chef.

I am passionate about the environment and do what we can to run a "green" household such as: recycle and compost, serve food that is organic and local, use only earth friendly cleaning/household products, etc.

A co-host since 2010, I truly enjoy meeting new people, and welcoming all of our fantastic regulars, many of which feel more like friends, at this point. I’d would love to host you in our charming guest cottage, a 5 minute walk from Asilomar State Beach in Pacific Grove.  I welcome people of all faiths, colors, orientations, and lifestyles to our little patch of paradise.

name: Modern Victorian with ocean view (30 day minimum)
description:
Long-term rental only! (30 day minimum).

The space
Hello!

We will be subletting our incredible home in Pacific Grove. We are looking for long-term renters.

This house has a full Gourmet Kitchen and wrap around porches two blocks from the beach and bike path. Fall is seriously the best moths to be in Pacific Grove, the fog melts away and the weather is warmer than the popular summer months.

We are offering the master bedroom with tempurpedic King sized bed and master bath along with the kitchen and a small bedroom.

You are a person that appreciates good style, global perspective, and culture. Appreciates the beauty of the Peninsula and the outdoors. Respectful of maintaining the cleanliness of the property and enjoys peace and quiet.

Please respond with a little about yourself and any further questions you may have.

Pacific Grove Awaits!!

neighborhood_overview: Our home is in a centrally located and within walking distance to beach town aquarium and Cannery Row.
host_about:
I love to travel. Every summer I visit my family in Germany and Italy. I am a Graphic Designer, so I work wherever I go. I love design which reflects my home, which is clean simple, lots of light and photography. I love photography as well and my daughter followed into my footsteps and got a degree at Brooks Institute, so be prepared to see beautiful art.

Enjoy!

3 Br/ 2 ba, off 17 mile drive at the Old Drive, one block from Spanish Bay, inside beautiful Pebble Beach. 8 min walk to beach. Close to Carmel, Monterey Aquarium, Fisherman's Wharf. The Old Drive Cottage has a private beautiful back yard with dining table and chairs, outdoor fireplace.

This lovely Pebble Beach home on The Old 17 Miles Drive boasts a wonderful location in Pebble Beach, with Spanish Bay a block away and the spectacular 17 Mile Drive a short stroll away. A beautifully landscaped garden with patio and gazebo offers a tranquil spot for entertaining or relaxing to the soothing sound of ocean waves. Inside, a fully
neighborhood_overview:
Inside Pebble Beach and walking distance to 17 miles drive and Spanish Bay.

Very peaceful and beautiful neighborhood

A short drive to Spanish Bay link. Close to Carmel and Monterey.

description:
Looking to book December 2021 and January 2022 and onward for 30 day minimum stay. I am a Superhost on Airbnb and have been for the past 4 years. Fabulous home in Pacific Grove with distant views of the ocean from my home perched up on the hill in Pacific Grove, huge outdoor Jacuzzi, huge stone fireplace and back deck, new large gas grill, gourmet kitchen, grand piano, 70" flat screen TV, near great restaurants and kept immaculate.

The space
You will love my home. It gets amazing reviews from guests. Plus the home was designed by the architect who designed the Monterey Bay Aquarium! A top-rated home in Pacific Grove.

The minimum booking is 30 nights.

It includes a high-end spa with waterfalls, powerful jets, and huge (seats 8) complete with a view of the ocean and gardens. You can hear your favorite music from the indoor/outdoor Bose sound system while sipping wine in the jacuzzi talking to your best friend, loved one, or family member. You
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet. I have wonderful, very kind, and helpful neighbors. The neighborhood is away from the tourist traffic. You will feel like you are in one of the last small town ocean front communities in the US, yet very close to lots of activity that you may wish to venture to.
host_about: I love life. I really enjoy when guests that stay at my house have a wonderful time. I am a people pleaser. I love beautiful things. I love to travel. I enjoy the finer things in life. And, I am constantly working to make the home more amazing!

name: John Steinbeck's Writer's Studio 30-Night Minimum
description:
This charming historic studio was once owned by American author John Steinbeck. It's been featured in several articles: including “20 Romantic AirBnB Getaways”, “Get Cultured While You Sleep at These AirBnBs That are Historical Landmarks," Airbnb Magazine's June/July 2019 edition and in NYT's "Frank Sinatra Slept Here, and So Can You" (August 2020).

There is a 30-night minimum stay for this cottage. Daily rate listed reflects discount and enjoy no city occupancy tax.

The space
Currently, there is construction at our next door neighbor's house. The work is being done Monday - Friday during the day. Please be aware that there will be some noise during the day.

'I bought a small house and garden in Pacific Grove...' (John Steinbeck: A Life in Letters). American author John Steinbeck wrote these words to a friend about this charming house he called home in the 1940s.

This cozy studio retreat has one bedroom with a queen bed and
neighborhood_overview:
The property is in a quiet residential neighborhood in Pacific Grove. It offers plenty of street parking.

As for the city, Pacific Grove has been called “Butterfly Town U.S.A.,” “The Most Romantic City in the U.S.,” “A Dreamy California Destination, ” as well as an idyllic place to get married, to honeymoon or to just hang out. Some of it is self-proclaimed, some the acclaim of people who have actually visited Pacific Grove.

You will find Pacific Grove on the very tip of the scenic, tree-shrouded Monterey Peninsula with a rocky coastline and an ambiance of charm, grace and beauty.

Founded in the 1870s as a Methodist summer retreat, Pacific Grove still bears the look and feel of yesteryear. As you stroll the residential streets admiring the charm of home after home, you will notice little plaques on many of the homes that bear the name of the original owner and the year in which it was built. To qualify for a plaque from the Heritage Society of Pacif
host_about:
When we are not super-hosting on Airbnb, Kevin is an author and motivational speaker, after spending 25+ years in high tech and Vicky loves to bake and works in HR. We eloped in Central Park in New York City and love the simplicity of what life brings.  We enjoy exploring new things.  Whether it’s new foods, places to visit or experiences, we love the adventure of life.  Most of all, we love time with each other, our kids, family and friends.  

We were lucky enough to purchase the home of John Steinbeck, American author and Pulitzer Prize winner, and have poured our labor of love in renovating these 100 year-old cottages.  Pacific Grove is our home away from home.  Kevin spent a lot of time writing his first book, A Life Worth Living, in our cottages - what a fantastic place for literary inspiration!

When Steinbeck resided here he formulated the plot of The Grapes of Wrath, and wrote several books including The Sea of Cortez.  This is the home he shared with his second wife, Gwyn Conger, who would become the inspiration for the lead antagonist, Kate Trask, in his epic novel, East of Eden.  In a letter to a friend, Steinbeck wrote of the cottages, “It is a pleasant little house, and we miss it… You’ll find you get a lot of thinking done in that house.” ' (from John Steinbeck, A Life in Letters).  

We are excited to share this wonderful piece of history with you!

name: Cannery Row and Beach Tranquility
description:
This is a very private and quiet guest house attached to the main Manor House with its own entrance and deck. The suite, its bathroom and bedroom/sitting area are of ample size with 10 foot ceilings. Mini Kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, dishes.

THIS AREA HAS WATER SHORTAGE AND SEVERE PENALTIES FOR OVERUSE OF WATER. PLEASE LIMIT ALL SHOWERS TO NO MORE THAN 9 MINUTES. DO NOT FLUSH TOILETS IF URINE ONLY.

The space
This is a large private guest house suite in an estate home which looks out over the garden. The suite has an outside private entrance and includes a queen sized bed on a wooden antique frame, 2 comfy reading chairs with a view of the garden, large walk-in closet with luggage rack, private bath, Flat screen TV with HDMI cable and dvd player, complimentary WIFI and basic cable tv, mini refrigerator with freezer, microwave, 4-cup coffeemaker, & access to a coin operated laundry onsite. Surprise Amenities upon arrival.

Gu
neighborhood_overview:
This is a very quiet neighborhood of retired adults and military. The location is within a short walking distance (15-20 min) to Cannery Row, Fisherman's Wharf, and the Monterey Bay Aquarium and a couple of very quiet beaches.

We use streaming video for news, sports and movies here, so bring your laptops and we have great Tv's monitors with HDMI Cables.
host_about: I love to travel, garden, cook and care for my dogs and horses.

name: Beautiful Villa With Ocean View
description:
Undoubtedly one of Monterey Bay's hidden gems! Our ocean view home has a beautiful view of Lover's Point and is perfectly located near EVERYTHING Pacific Grove, Monterey, Carmel and Pebble Beach has to offer.

City of Pacific Grove STR License #0129

The space
Our home was professionally remodeled down to the studs in 2006 and kept as a private vacation home. Each room has been professionally decorated with Tommy Bahama furniture and designer selected accessories. It has never been available as a rental until now. It features Brazilian cherry hardwood floors throughout, custom mahogany cabinetry, custom mahogany doors and windows, new window coverings, skylights and old world textures and arches. It won the Preservation Award from the Heritage Society of Pacific Grove for restoration in exemplary fashion and retaining original exterior form and features.

The beautiful gas fireplace welcomes you into the living room and is ready to keep you wa

host_about: We enjoy Pacific Grove and all the activities that the area has to offer like the Monterey Bay Aquarium, the ocean and beach, Carmel, Big Sur, Santa Cruz, and all the fabulous dinning opportunities. Being a family, variety is important and Monterey Bay provides something for everybody!!

name: Aspen Room at Asilomar Beach License # 0450
description:
Large master bedroom has a spacious comfy king bed with mattress warmer and accomodates two quite nicely. It includes a private entrance with a combo lock, a private bath and sitting/dining area. A cozy electric fireplace can be used for warmth on chilly nights and mornings or just for ambience. It is tastefully decorated with a forest theme to make you feel right at home just a few blocks from beautiful Asilomar Beach!

The space
You’ll feel right at home in the spacious master bedroom with all of the creature comforts. Complimentary coffee and tea, a mini fridge and microwave.

What makes this space unique is the location and the forest theme which makes you feel like you are in a wooded forest, yet you have all the comforts of home.

Guest access
Guests will have access to a private bathroom, private sitting area, private entrance with a combo lock, wifi, and Roku tv with over 500,000 options for television. Laundry servic
neighborhood_overview: What I love about the neighborhood is that it is safe, scenic, a couple blocks to the beach, a short walk to Pebble Beach's Spanish Bay and Seventeen Mile Drive and right around the corner from Asilomar Conference Grounds, a five minute drive to downtown Pacific Grove and Lover's Point, a ten minute drive to Monterey and the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, and the Fisherman's Wharf, a fifteen minute drive to Downtown Carmel and only a forty five minute drive down scenic Hwy 1 to beautiful Big Sur.  Activities in the area include great restaurants and dining, world renown golfing, hiking, biking, walking the scenic coastline, wine tasting, whale watching, kayaking, surfing, scuba diving, art galleries, and the list goes on.
host_about: I have lived on the Monterey Peninsula for thirty four years and have practiced as a Massage Therapist for twenty five years.  I enjoy living in places that offer an abundance of natural beauty and I walk the coastline almost every day with my dogs never taking for granted how blessed I am to be here.  I have traveled to Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Australia, New Zealand, Canada, Mexico and many places in the United States and have always found it interesting to learn about different cultures and people.  I enjoy cooking as well as a good meal out, receiving massages as well as giving them, time with family and friends, reading a good book, watching a good movie and meeting new and interesting people.  My life motto is to enjoy the journey!

name: A Lovely Room in Center Monterey Bay
description:
This is a very nice small(12ft*12ft)room with a full-size bed, a computer desk, a night stand, and a closet, which is a good choice for one guest and also a comfortable place for two guests.

The space
Your stay will be refreshing as you find open spaces to relax in. Clean, simple, quiet, and natural are the themes in this space.
The bedroom with a full size bed you will be staying in is on ground floor. The full bathroom is across the hall. The half bathroom is next living room. If you need, a second full bathroom upstairs is available.
PLEASE DO NOT BOOK ONE NIGHT RESERVATIONS WITHOUT ASKING IN ADVANCE. We rarely accept one night reservations on weekends or accept one night reservations more than a week or two (depending on season) in advance or if there is an empty night between bookings. Note pricing varies according to seasons, weekends and special events.

Guest access
You will have a private room with a full-size bed with en
neighborhood_overview: PG is a neighborhood of unique housing and very friendly people. The neighborhood has a historical downtown of local shops, a movie theater, local galleries and restaurants featured with American, Mexican, Japanese and Chinese styles.
host_about: I live in Pacific Grove with my family(my husband, step-son, and daughter). We love traveling and meeting people of different cultures. After moving to this new house, we decided to host travelers in our home from time to time and share our experience with each other. Please come and visit us! We can not wait to share with you the history and charming scenic spots of Monterey Bay, as well as great hikes, varied local restaurants, featured local galleries, and many other interesting things to do in the area. We are looking forward to helping you enjoy the beauty of the historic Monterey Peninsula and surrounding areas.

name: Modern Beach House
description:
You'll fall in love with the quaint town of Pacific Grove where we built our beautiful bungalow located in an upscale quiet neighborhood. Our bungalow is steps away from the beach recreation trail leading to Lovers Pt and Monterey. We comply with Pacific Grove Home Share requirements, license #0451.

The space
You'll fall in love with the quaint town of Pacific Grove where we just built our beautiful beach bungalow located in an upscale quiet neighborhood. Our beach bungalow is steps away from the recreation trail that leads to Lovers Point beach and nearby restaurants. Take the trail a little further and you arrive at the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row. The famous 17-mile Drive starts at the next street corner and leads to Asilomar, Pebble Beach, Carmel, Carmel by the Sea, and Carmel Valley.

You can park your car at the steps on the right side of the driveway.

The private beach bungalow offers you a brand new beautifully built
neighborhood_overview: Friendly neighbors, quaint downtown area, walking and biking trails along coast, Aquarium, Monterey wharf, Kayak rentals, Bike rentals, fishing, diving and much more.

name: Private Cozy Suite/Cannery Row
description:
Easy walk to Cannery Row and Monterey Bay Aquarium. Private-entrance to your personal retreat with spa comforts. Easy access to beach, biking, and many great restaurants on beautiful Monterey Bay. 10 min. drive to Carmel and Pebble Beach. Plenty of street parking.

The space
Two rooms with your own private entrance. You enter into the sitting area with a very comfy couch, that doubles as a single bed. This room also has a kitchenette including: coffee maker, microwave, two-burner counter-top cooker, small refrigerator, toaster oven, electric kettle, sink, wine glasses, coffee cups, plates, bowls and cutlery. The bedroom has a very comfortable Queen bed with beautiful linens, and the beautiful spa style bathroom with skylight is fully supplied with plush towels, hairdryer, iron, and lots of toiletries.
The private entrance suite is part of our home but completely separate. We have modified with sound-proofing, but you may sometimes here us in the main part o
neighborhood_overview: Directly across the street we have a beautiful park with lawns and oak tree's, its like having a giant front yard. We are 10 minutes to Carmel and Pebble Beach and walking distance to Cannery Row and Monterey Bay Aquarium.

name: Lovely House in Pacific Grove (Long term rental)
description:
This lovely remodeled home has 3 bedrooms, den, 2 baths, an office and one car garage. The driveway can fit additional 3 or more cars. It has a secluded outdoor living space with a gas grill. The house can easily accommodate 8 adults comfortably. Centrally located and it is 1 block from the Pebble Beach country club gate entrance and about 1 mile from the Aquarium, Cannery Row, Lover's Point, and downtown PG.
Minimum stay of 30 days.

The space
Welcome! Beautifully remodeled home located in the heart of Pacific Grove in Del Monte Forest. Steps to Pebble Beach entrance, walk to Spanish Bay, a miles from the Monterey Bay Aquarium, lots of natural light, fully furnished, fully stocked kitchen, a small office, living room with fireplace, a lovely and secluded outdoor living space with a gas BBQ, and plenty of parking spaces on the premises.
The master bedroom has its private bath while the other 2 rooms will share a bathroom. Each room can accommodate
neighborhood_overview: Enjoy the small-town charm of Pacific Grove as you explore the many shops and restaurants of this Central Coast town. With the world famous 17 miles drive and Pebble Beach as your back drop, you can experience why some have called this region as the  paradise on earth. There are endless things to do such as biking or hiking through the beautiful trails along the beach; kayaking, snorkeling, or scuba diving in the Monterey Bay. Don't forget to discover the dramatic exhibits at the Monterey Bay Aquarium or historic Cannery Row. Another great area attraction for fine dining and souvenirs is the Monterey Fisherman’s Wharf where some of the country’s best seafood and clam chowder are served.
host_about:
I am an engineer working in the Silicon Valley.  My wife and I have been married for over 30 years.  We enjoy biking, hiking, skiing, and traveling all over.  We love the Monterey and Pacific Grove area ever since we took our two kids on a bike trailer going through 17 miles drive when they were just babies.  We bought this house in Pacific Grove and we like to share this beautiful area with other folks from all over the world. 

Our motto in life is:  work hard and play even harder.

name: Cozy private cottage
description:
Cozy separate cottage behind my house in quiet neighborhood . Nice little patio in the back. Fifteen minute walk to Fisherman's Wharf , beach and downtown Monterey. Short drive to Carmel and Pacific Grove. Our cottage is available on a monthly basis 30 days or longer

The space
A proper Queen size bed. Futon available for extra guest or children. Kitchenette with microwave, refrigerator, and electric kettle. Also sink and dishes.





House has been in the family for generations.

The patio is great for morning coffee in the sun.
90 second walk to wooded park, ideal for picnic

Monterey local available for advise on entertainment and dinning

Old Italian family neighborhood . Quiet and friendly

Quick access to Highway 1. Twenty minute drive to Big Sur

We do have WiFi unfortunately it is not great due to the area were we are located. If WiFi is important to you it

name: The Monarch Home - Cozy & Relaxing
description:
Looking to stay in a quaint little house, this is it!! Clean, cozy, and in great location–cheerful 2-bed 2-bath home located on 17 Mile Drive near Asilomar Beach with easy access to Pebble Beach, Monterey, and Carmel.

WiFi, Apple TV, and an once a month cleaning included. Also comes with all utilities (water, gas, electricity, trash & sewer) and gardening services.

Please note this is a 30 day plus rental.

The space
Our home is located on 17 Mile Drive in the quaint town of Pacific Grove between Monterey and Pebble Beach. Walking distance to beach and biking trails with easy access to all areas of the Monterey Peninsula
-Two comfortable bedrooms have queen beds
-Work desks in each bedroom.
-Two light filled bathrooms are with bathtub and shower
-Fully equipped kitchen with a dining area
-Spacious cozy living room - Laundry facilities - Ample space available for parking.
-The house accommodates FOUR (4) MAXIM
neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a beautiful small beach town with a relaxed atmosphere. There is plenty of beach access and scenic hiking or biking trails from the property. The house backs onto a little alley road that runs along a gorgeous, wooded park.
host_about: My family love to travel like locals and meet new people. Staying at Bed and Breakfasts has made this experience possible.  We are excited and feel fortunate to offer our own home in Pacific Grove for others to enjoy.

name: The Little Blue House
description:
30 day or longer stays only. Quaint 105+ year old, 400 square foot cottage on a quiet one way street just a short block to downtown Pacific Grove. Beautiful stained glass windows, distressed wood floor and fenced-in backyard with wild overgrown garden. Newly remodeled bathroom/shower in 2021

The space
Beautiful old Victorian cottage on quiet one way street. One bedroom, one bathroom. The bathroom is off the bedroom so if people are sleeping in the living room on the sofa bed, they would have to enter the bedroom to get to the bathroom. Lovely stained glass windows in each room. Living room has queen sofa bed and bedroom has queen bed. Kitchen has bistro/bar table and chairs. The house is so close to cafes/restaurants and Library along with Natural History Museum, you may never use your car once here. One mile to the Aquarium along beautiful coast bike path.

Guest access
You have access to whole cottage. Full kitchen with coffee maker.
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet neighborhood of quaint houses located around the cottage.   Please be thoughtful with the neighbors.
host_about: Local artist who also works as an occupational therapist specializing in pain management.  I have not owned a car since 2009, and sail/kayak in the Monterey Bay if I'm not on one of my amazing bikes.  I live just up the street in a 110 year old Victorian where my children grew up into better adults than I am, both of whom are Junior Olympians in volleyball.  Sometimes I love sitting in the Art House or The LIttle Blue House more than my own -- peaceful and serene doesn't do it justice....

name: 760 Ocean View at Lovers Point Park
description:
True ocean front house featuring 2 view decks, and 180 degree view of the Pacific coastline and Monterey Bay. Watching the ever-changing Pacific Ocean by day, and a dazzling blanket of twinkling city lights by night. Amazing activities year round.

Pacific Grove STR License # 0165
Please refer to city website for details

The space
Approx. 1200 square foot Ocean front house with a nicely maintained garden. The house has 2 bed rooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, modern kitchen, and a dining room/den.
The house has awesome ocean views in a central location for strolling, golfing, kayaking, biking, romancing, or doing nothing at all. Simply enjoy the Ocean View !!

Guest access
The entire vacation home : The house has 2 bed rooms, 2 bath rooms. A living room seats 6 people, it a fire-place and 50 inch TV on top of the fireplace. Kitchen is quipped with refrigerator, dish-washer, stove, oven, microwave, and some small applian
neighborhood_overview:
Imagine whale watching from your own deck as they enter the Pacific Grove Marine Gardens Park (an under the ocean park) directly across from the house. Watch the scuba divers diving just a stones throw from the shoreline. Two-blocks to famous centrally located Lover's Point Park. Take a walk along the beach on the Monterey Bay Coastal Trail; past Asilomar Beach, onward to Pebble Beach and the famous 17-Mile Drive. Or towards Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row and Fisherman’s Wharf by the historic downtown Monterey with its shops & restaurants.

Stroll down Ocean View Boulevard to Lover's Point Park and rent a bike or surrey (4-person bike), travel along the Monterey Bay Coastal Trail to the Aquarium, Cannery Row and Old Fisherman's wharf and beyond! Save the parking fees because of the convenience of never needing to take your car. Bike rental is available at the Lover's Point Park (next to the snack bar) and at Cannery row as well. name: Casa Rustica,Walk to Aquarium,30 Days Min. Stay
description:
30 days minimum stay. Our home is located up the hill on David Ave...a short 5 minute walk to the Aquarium and Cannery Row. The home has been remodeled/upgraded. Pet friendly on a case by case basis.Additional pet fee of $250/month will be charged.

The space
Remodel/Upgrade 2015. This woodsy home is on a lot with another 2 bedroom/2 bathroom cottage (Casa Amarilla), which is also available for 30 day minimum stay. For multiple family/larger or corporate groups accommodations, both homes are available to rent for the same time period.

The home is approximately 1,800 square feet, 3 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms (1 bathroom in master suite with tub), living room, dining area, fully equipped kitchen, fireplace, and a fenced private flagstone patio/deck area, with partial views of the Monterey Bay, and forced air heating. Duel pane windows/doors...well insulated and quiet.

Wood flooring throughout. Vaulted ceilings, several skylights, re
neighborhood_overview: Traditional Monterey neighborhood...character, butterflies & Cypress trees.  Get out and walk the 1st State Capital of California.  Abundant Marine creatures. Something going on most every weekend. Car buffs galore.
host_about:
Over the years, I have been fortunate to have rubbed elbows with some of the most talented people in the Hospitality and Real Estate professions.  Little did I know these mentors would prepare me for my Vacation Rental venture this year.

I've also discovered my inner gift for interior decorating.  Casa Amarilla has been a labor-of-love restoring and modernizing this quaint Monterey Cottage...a stone throw from the Aquarium.

My green thumb came back to life as well.  The patio and fenced garden area has blossomed this spring, and soothes one's sole at the end of an active day.  A wood burning pot belly fire-pit and charcoal BBQ enhance this spacious artistic zen-like garden, while taking in the distant Monterey Bay view...our guests favorite!

While staying at Casa Amarilla, don't hesitate to call or text me if you and your group need anything at all!

Sincerely,
Guita

name: Peaceful, private, cozy and convenient
description:
Private entrance spacious bedroom suite/ large bathroom retreat has easy access (walking, driving, bus) to downtown Monterey, Cannery Row, Carmel, Pebble Beach and Big Sur. Non-smoking, street parking in a safe neighborhood.

The space
A cozy room for 2 with a private tub shower. The patio and garden can be enjoyed in the morning or under a star filled, perhaps full moon, night. A refrigerator in a closed cabinet on the covered patio can be available upon request for keeping leftovers, beverages or perishable food. There is a high quality whole house water filtration system for your health and wellness. You can feel really good about taking a shower and drinking the tap water. Coffee, tea, pastry and fruit will be provided.
I am a bodyworker so if you are interested in a massage, facial or energetic healing session please check ahead of time for availability.

Guest access
You will have a separate bedroom and bathroom. You may enjoy
neighborhood_overview:
I live in the Historic section of Monterey. It is an charming neighborhood that is quiet and safe. At the top of the hill is a lovely view and a convenient stroll down to Monterey, Fisherman's Wharf, the scenic bike path leading to the Aquarium, Pacific Grove and the beach.
Across the street from my house, there is a bus stop offering transportation for you as well as your bicycle if you have one, in case you prefer not to walk UP the hill.
host_about:
Hi! I'm very excited about hosting people from all over the world that visit my little slice of paradise.  I am a mother, grandmother, massage practitioner, cosmetologist and school teacher.  I currently live on my on in a beautiful sacred space. My favorite place to be is out in nature or on a dance floor. I love what I do and offering massage, a facial, substitute teaching in a classroom or playing with my grandchildren bring me great joy. 
I believe that we are here to experience harmony and happiness so life is not about the number of breaths we take but the number of moments that take our breath away!
I would love to travel myself in the future but for now I'm looking forward to sharing with those that travel to beautiful Monterey. I don't feel deprived or as if I'm missing out when where I live is this awesome.

name: A Perfect Golfer's Get Away
description:
Ranch house in the best golf community of Pebble Beach. A short walk to the 17 Miles Beach. This is the best place to relax and unwind! House is back to the fairway in MPCC. Easy access to Carmel and the beautiful Big Sur Coast line. Golf is back now!

The space
Recently remodeled ranch-style vacation home, with a brand new kitchen and 2 renovated bathrooms. House has hardwood flooring and large windows overlooking a golf course. The 3 bedrooms will comfortably fit 6 people, with 4 beds (2 queen, 1 full and 1 twin).

Guest access
Full access to entire house. House has a full (newly renovated) kitchen, washer and dryer and two full bathrooms. Golf course view in the backyard.

Other things to note
Pebble Beach is a gated community and tourist destination. Please tell the guards that you are visiting this address. I will put your name on the list at the gate.
neighborhood_overview: Situated in the Del Monte Forest, the neighborhood is very quiet and perfect for a relaxing stay. The surrounding area is a perfect blend of both land and sea, with the ocean to the west and mountains to the east. An easy run or stroll to the 17 mile Beach via a 3 mile loop.
host_about: My life goal: To climb Mount Kilimanjaro
neighbourhood: Del Monte Forest, California, United States

name: Peaceful Cozy Beach Cottage
description:
Get ready for relaxation and tranquility in this cozy beach cottage situated two blocks away from the Pacific Ocean in the beach tract area of Pacific Grove. Nature awaits for you!

The space
The cottage includes a bright and cheery floor plan that includes beautiful hardwood floors throughout the living room with a partial ocean view, dining room, kitchen and entertainment room that opens into the backyard patio area.

There are 2 bedrooms and 1 bath with 1 queen size bed and 2 twin size beds.

The bathroom awaits you with a bathtub and tile floors.

Guest access
Full kitchen with use of refrigerator, microwave, toaster oven, gas range/oven and coffee maker. In addition, there is a washer and dryer provided as courtesy in the garage for your convenience.

Free high speed Wi-Fi is available as well as TV.

There is no phone service.

Cell phone service is limited.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is family friendly and very peaceful and quiet. Many residents are long time homeowners who respect their surroundings and nature.

Sunsets, Monarch butterflies, whale watching, sea otters, marine life, golfing, scuba diving, cycling, walking, relaxing and shopping are all within your reach.
host_about: My husband and I are both IT professionals. I love interior design and gardening and my husband loves music and sports.

description:
Enjoy strolling through the small shops or dining in the exquisite small family owned restaurants or enjoy the gorgeous oceanfront recreation trail or famous Monterey Bay Aquarium, all just steps away from the penthouses

The space
THE TWO BEDROOM SUITE: includes a master suite with a king bed large flat screen TV with DVD and bathroom complete with a deep soaking tub and separate stall shower. The extra bedroom features a queen bed and accesses a nearby hall bath with a roomy stall shower.

THE ONE BEDROOM SUITE: includes a formal dining area with seating for 8 guests. The bedroom includes two queen size pillow top poster beds, flat screen TV with DVD and a private bath with a deep soaking tub and separate stall shower. Additionally, there is also a roomy hall bath with an over-sized stall shower.

This exquisite property is comprised of two individual suites. A two bedroom suite and a one bedroom suite They are conven

Deemed one of America's last small towns, also is known as “Butterfly town USA' due to the thousands of Monarch butterfly's that winter here! This luxury executive penthouse suite will impress even the most discriminating of guests.

name: Little Lighthouse — Ocean views & close to town!
description:
Little Lighthouse Cottage — Ocean views, on the main street of downtown Pacific Grove, newly renovated & ready to call home for your next, extended beach vacation. Two blocks from the ocean and a short stroll to town, Lover's Point and the famous Cannery Row.

Receive 60% off the nightly rate for stays of 31 days or more, and pay no city occupancy tax!

The space
This darling cottage, known as Little Lighthouse, is the lower cottage in a two-unit, WWII-era Carriage House. She has stood through over seventy years of history, and gathered stories in her rooms of love, friends and family. After months of renovation, this lower cottage, Little Lighthouse, is ready for rent. It sits in the beautiful retreat neighborhood of Pacific Grove.

The quaint downtown of Pacific Grove is just a six minute stroll down the street to the right as you exit the front door. A less than 15-minute walk in the other direction takes you to historic Cannery Row and The
neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove offers an unparalleled quality of life. Sharing borders with the Monterey Bay, City of Monterey, Pacific Ocean, and the Del Monte Forest, our town offers breathtaking views and recreational activities. The City provides services to the community including: excellent fire, emergency, and ocean rescue services; an award-winning natural history museum; the lowest crime rate of any city in Monterey County; a nationally-recognized 18-hole golf course; a monarch butterfly habitat sanctuary; sandy beaches; and, the oldest continuously-operating lighthouse on the west coast. We are known for our small-town hospitality and friendliness in a place we simply call 'P.G.' (from The City of Pacific Grove website)
host_about: Meet the family! ... Gary (Dad), Jim (Stacey's Husband), Stacey (Daughter), Lynea (Mom), Amy (Daughter), and Michael (Amy's husband). We have always had a deep love of family togetherness and making memories. We built our family cabin in Arnold in 1983, and bought a darling carriage house in Pacific Grove  together in 2014.  We poured all our love and care into renovating it—to create a special retreat not only for our family, but for yours. We believe that memories shared are some of the most precious times in life. Please come for a visit and share some of yours with us!

Charming cottage, with ocean views, on the main street of Pacific Grove. One of two, newly renovated cottages, ready to call home for your next beach vacation. Only two blocks from the ocean and a short stroll to town, Lover's Point and the famous Cannery Row.

Receive 60% off the nightly rate for stays of 31 days or more, and pay no city occupancy tax!

The space
Lighthouse Cottage is the large, main upper-cottage in a two-unit, WWII-era Carriage House. She has stood through over seventy years of history, and gathered stories in her rooms of love, friends and family.

name: Cottage on 17 Mile Dr, Pebble Beach. Tesla Charger
description:
Nestled in the enchanting forest, this romantic guest house cottage has sweeping ocean views, 50 miles of forested hiking trails, Poppy Hills golf course and famous restaurant. Come enjoy quiet, restorative nature while enjoying luxury amenities.

The space
Designed by the famous architect Charlie Rose, the cottage (separate, but attached to the main house by a roof) has a tall and expansive skylight to enjoy the starry nights right from the living room sofa.

Come enjoy quiet, restorative nature while enjoying luxury suite amenities. In addition to your master bedroom and living room, there’s a newly remodeled kitchenette (no oven w/ dishwasher and microwave), a second pull out bed for friends, a quiet patio for reading, and for your longer stays, a full washer and dryer. All of the above at what our guests say is a bargain price!
neighborhood_overview: Our property is on the 17 Miles Drive and in front of Poppy Hill Golf Course. Convenient located at center of Pebble Beach, few minutes to South to Carmel (Scuba Diving, hiking Point Lobos State Park, Big Sur, ) few minutes North to Monterrey (Cannery Road / Aquarian / Whale Watch / Simon fishing),  Pacific Grove (See Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary). Carmel full of fine dining restaurants, 100+ art galleries, Wine Tasting and endless shopping...
host_about: Hi!  My husband and I fell in love with Pebble Beach and we moved here 20  years ago. We love hiking, walking on the beach every day, golfing, and cooking. My husband is a small business consultant and was the president of the Rotary Club (community volunteering), and we love our friends. I speak Chinese as well.

One of 2 rooms available for rent in a charming rustic house located in Old Monterey, over looking the Skyline Forest. 15-20 minute walk to shops, Restaurants, Fisherman's Wharf, beach, Aquarium, Cannery Row, Down Town Monterey, Monterey Sports Center, Veterans Park, hiking, 10 minute drive to the Airport, Laguna Seca Race Track, Fair Grounds.

The space
Vast open space surrounds the house as it overlooks the Skyline Forest. You'll love that it's only a 10 minute walk to Downtown Monterey, shops, restaurants, bars, clubs, Aquarium, Cannery Row, Fisherman's Wharf, Festivals, and more. It's located right on Sky Line Forest and since it's a corner lot and there are no houses built behind it, it feels like you're in Carmel Valley or Big Sur. Absolute tranquility and peace, perfect for a relaxation or meditation retreat or get away. Also the house is located uphill and in the sun belt and with no large trees in the yard to block the sun, you'd get a rare opportunity to
neighborhood_overview: This is one of the safest neighborhoods in Monterey and offers an old world charm. It's quiet and serene and it seems like time stands still here :) no street noise, private and sunny :) you'll hear wonderful sounds of crickets at night and beautiful sounds of the ocean and sea lions at dawn.
host_about: My love for travle and meeting new people inspired me to open up my home to Airbnb and it has truely been a wonderful experience.

name: Peaceful Space near DLI + Cannery Row
description:
Connected to main house, yet quiet and private.
Separate entrance.
Large Tub/Shower.
TV, Refrigerator, Coffee maker.

Close to Stores, Restaurants, Beaches, Aquarium, DLI.

The space
Queen size bed, small couch. Powerful wall heater. Flat panel TV. Small refrigerator. Large shower and tub.

Guest access
Guests access is granted to the room and outside paths to the bordering streets. Kitchen use and laundry, just call and let us know, it should be no problem.

Other things to note
We encourage our guests to park in the carport or driveway. The carport is small, but two small to medium cars can fit side by side. Park as close to the house as possible without blocking anyone else's vehicle.

To minimize possible discomfort to sensitive individuals we are requesting no pets.
neighborhood_overview:
This is one of the historic neighborhoods of Monterey, known as "New Monterey." Cannery workers lived up on this hill. When the boat loads of sardines arrived, the canneries would blow a whistle and the workers would go down to the factories.

The neighborhood is full of creative people and it's reflected in the diversity of interesting shops and restaurants on Lighthouse Avenue in Monterey, and in the area surrounding Cannery Row. There are many fancy and less fancy restaurants, a few bars, a Goodwill thrift store, funky little clothing consignment shops, vape shops, tattoo parlors and massage places. It is awesome and authentic, as is Safeway, Ace Hardware, Rite Aid, Starbucks, Downtown Pacific Grove, The Motorcycle Museum, PG Art Center, Natural History Museum, Lovers Point, the beaches, Aquarium, wharves, etc.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Monterey. I've driven a taxi here off and on for many years, and have really enjoyed getting to know the community from this perspective. Monterey Peninsula is a very interesting and diverse place with a lot of great people.

I like to read, go to movies, and walk on the beach with Wendy. I like meeting the people who visit Monterey, and I like to travel too. I like reading about current events, science and history. Wendy likes social media, shopping and thrift stores.

name: Both#JewelboxCottages🏮Courtyrd🔥Firepit⛩Pergola🥩BBQ
description:
Pacific Grove banned most <30-day home rentals. Feel free to ask for tips on how to stay locally, even if it's not with us.

A cozy 1-bdrm cottage + carriage house studio in a private, lit courtyard with fire pit, lounge set, pergola, Redwood table, pet-friendly
- Cottage: Cal king, full kitchen, living room + full bathroom
- Carriage House: Carriage house with queen + full bathroom

The space
THE AREA
10 minutes to everything: Walk to the Monterey Bay Aquarium, to Lovers Point beach, to downtown Pacific Grove, to Cannery Row for amusements, shopping and great dining. Drive to the 17 Mile Drive, Pebble Beach and Carmel. Day trip to wine tasting, Big Sur and California's famous Highway 1.

This unique home is perfectly suited for two couples or a family that wants privacy but also to be in a cozy spot together. Meet in the main cottage kitchen to share a meal and relax, or retreat to your private spaces for quiet time.
neighborhood_overview: The Retreat area of Pacific Grove is a community of quaint cottages that are steps from the ocean, steps to the Monterey Bay Aquarium and minutes away by car from Pebble Beach, the world famous Concours d'Elegance, a US Open golf course, Carmel by the Sea, the 17-Mile Drive and just a half-hour drive to Big Sur.
host_about:
I lead social media for a global insurance company and my husband Sal heads up software architecture for a finance company. We have two kiddos and a dog. 

I really like being involved with AirBnB and have participated in several conferences and projects with them, because they do a good job of looping in hosts from the Bay Area.

We are grateful for our family homes on Monterey Bay and in Lake Tahoe and enjoy sharing them with other families. We would also love to share our Sausalito home, one day.

I'm always happy to offer tips on restaurants and things to do in at any one of our places.

I post from @donnerbliss and @tripmogul on IG, sharing what's new and exciting on the Truckee, LakeTahoe, PacificGrove, Monterey and Sausalito hashtags. We love connecting with our guests, helping them with their plans and then hearing how their stays were. 

Looking forward to sharing our place with you!

host_about:
As of June 23rd 2021, The Seven Gables Inn is managed by the Kirkwood Collection. 

Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982 and since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Innkeeping. 

For all reservation questions please feel free to send us a message as we will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total 25 individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom and many with private outside entrances that only you would use. 

Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. 

Each room has a Keurig beverage maker.

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, The Kirkwood Collection and Staff

The space
Beautiful large suite for a relaxing get away. Dining area, kitchen and bathroom. High ceilings, outdoor setting area with native garden.

Guests will enjoy a dedicated outdoor sitting area, beautiful views of the garden.

neighborhood_overview: We're are next door to MIIS,  2 minute walk to downtown Monterey, three blocks to the Air Bus, Great Restaurants, Trader Joes, Star Bucks, and Colton Hall (1st Capital of California). Monterey wharf, museums, Custom house plaza, and bike path are all within walking. Cannery Row and the Monterey Aquarium are 2 miles away. Carmel is a 5 minute drive, and Big Sur is just 30 minutes away.

name: Pebble Beach Guest House
description:
Pebble Beach guest house located in the quiet Del Monte Forest, a golf destination and gated community. 650 sq.ft. 1 bedroom with queen bed, living room, gas fireplace, WiFi, TV, kitchenette, private deck with fire pit and hot tub.
7 min walk to the ocean. 3 min drive to The Inn at Spanish Bay. 5 miles to the Pebble Beach Lodge.
2 passes for admission to the Monterey Bay Aquarium.
Portable crib available.
No pets. No smoking on property.

The space
The guest house is a one-bedroom quarters attached to the rear of the main house with it's own private entrance. It was remodeled for the benefit of caring for our parents so it was designed with special attention for comfort and feeling at home. Some of the features include a gas fireplace, Directv and cable, smart TV, French doors leading to a private rear deck, Calcutta marble, large shower, walk-in closet with robes provided, 2 burner induction stove top, microwave drawer, Keurig,
neighborhood_overview: My home is located just a few minutes walk of the Pacific ocean, Point Joe and Asilomar Beach,  just down the street from the Monterey Peninsula Country Club  in the northern area of Pebble Beach Del Monte Forest.  It is a quiet neighborhood, a pleasant walk to the beach, an easy drive to either PB Resorts, Spanish Bay and The Lodge, 10-15 minutes of most of the peninsula cities, and a great place to bicycle.
host_about:
About the guest house:
The GH is located and attached at the rear of my home, with it's own private entrance.   It is a 1 bedroom suite with a separate kitchenette and living room.   The kitchen has a convection toaster oven, 2 burner induction stove top, under counter refrigerator, and under counter built in microwave.  I try to stock it with everything you might need if you plan to stay in and prepare breakfast and meals, including fresh eggs from our chickens.
Additional features:  Free WiFi.  Gas lit fireplace.  Television (Directv) with ESPN and Netflix.  Walk in closet.   Patio seating with fire pit.  On deck hot tub.  Portable crib.  Off street parking.  There are 4 steps up deck to reach the guest house.  
Passes for free entrance to the Monterey Bay Aquarium.  
About Us:
I have had the pleasure of living in Pebble Beach for the past 30 years after living in Albuquerque which I miss dearly, and raised in Buffalo, NY, a great place to grow up and learn to be hardy.   It’s been a wonderful mix of worlds.  
After moving to Pebble Beach we build the guest house with the intent of having our parents live with us, so there was a lot of love put into its design and special features.  I had the pleasure of having my Mom, Hope, live with us for 12 years.  We always enjoy having company over and now what better way to meet new friends and share the beauty of this area than to offer our guest home to you.  
As a host I hope to make this your home away from home.  I want our guests to feel free to come over for anything they might need or to visit and share a glass of wine.

City of Pacific Grove Short-Term Rental License #351

Bungalow-by-the-Sea is a 2 bedroom 1 bath cottage, two blocks from Lovers Point Beach, downtown Pacific Grove, and walking distance to the Aquarium.

The space
The bungalow is equipped with kitchenware, Pots, Pans, cooking utensils, silverware, plates, bowls, cups and coffer maker. Fresh bed linens, and towels are provided for guests as well. You can hear the surf from the back porch. Minimum age to book is 25. Note - Pacific Grove has banned home and condo rentals less than 30 days. They also have a 12% tax on rentals of 30 days or less, that is why we set the minimum at 31 days. Let us know if this works for your party. Thanks very much.

You can hear the surf from the back porch.

A favorite walk to the beach is thru the Asilomar
Conference Center grounds, with Julia Morgan (Hearst Castle) architecture and plenty of deer. There is a playground about a block away.

neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a very quiet seaside town with excellent restaurants within walking distance from Seven Gables, a biking and hiking trail running for miles along the oceanfront and spectacular natural scenery.  Pacific Grove and Monterey are right next to each other.  Carmel is just a short 5 mile drive away.
host_about:
As of June 23rd 2021, The Seven Gables Inn is managed by the Kirkwood Collection. 

Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982 and since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Innkeeping. 

For all reservation questions please feel free to send us a message as we will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total 25 individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom and many with private outside entrances that only you would use. 

Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. 

Each room has a Keurig beverage maker.

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, The Kirkwood Collection and Staff

name: Romantic Private  Master Suite & Gardens #0427
description:
Escape to this master suite with a private entrance. Experience breathtaking views of the world famous Monterey Bay. Listen to the waves and watch sea life play from your adjustable King bed. Unwind with a glass of wine or fresh morning coffee in a pair of comfy chairs or at the dining table for two.
A private stone patio will entice you outside.

Private entrance, Mini fridge, microwave, coffee pot, 40’ TV, washer & dryer, private stone patio, BBQ & dining table. Quiet neighborhood!

The space
Listed as a private room, but it is so much more.

A private entrance and set of stairs takes you directly to your Ocean View Suite. You will also have sole access to a beautifully manicured stone patio and garden.

The suite is set up for you to enjoy a restful night's sleep, an ocean view with your coffee and a dining table perfect for two.

Guest access
Guests will have their own private entrance.
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is very quiet both day and night. Easy access to a walking trail along the coast will lead you into Monterey and the Monterey Bay Aquarium.

We are 3/4 miles from Lovers Point beach with fine dining and casual food.

We are 1 mile from downtown Pacific Grove, a very quaint little town with a variety of fine restaurants .
host_about: We love to hike, walk along the water, wine & dine, and have friends to our home.  We have been running a bed and breakfast for our friends every since we moved to Pacific Grove, just not for profit! Ha ha.  People love to come to our area and our home, and we love it too!  We have traveled all over Europe several times and love Southern Germany & the Alps.  Especially hiking there, the people and the friendliness.  We do say thought that the hardest thing about living where we do is "Where do you go for vacation?"  We just like it here so much. We are California natives so can tell you much about all of Cali.  I love to plan itinneraries for our friends and guest especially day trips to Big Sur.

name: Quaint Pacific Grove/Pebble Beach
description:
Sanitized master queen bedroom/bath AND at request, twin bedroom/private separate bath in quaint Pacific Grove. *Second rm would be available for additional fee of $25 per person including children after 2 which must be Family.Walk to Pacific Grove, Cannery Row, Monterey Bay or drive to Carmel or Big Sur which is only 30 mi. New smart TV in master bedroom. No TV in twin. Portable bed for twin or master. License #0306. Please drive slowly in cul de sac!!

The space
Our home is on a small, quiet street. The bedroom you will be staying in is on the second floor; a master Bedroom/bathroom and a bedroom with two twin beds and a bath across the hall. Both available if you are a family. There is a $25 fee for each additional person, including children. Each bedroom has three windows, and is light and airy with hardwood floors and travertine tiles in the bath. The master bath is large, has two sinks with a bath tub, and shower. Lots of mirrors makes it great if yo
neighborhood_overview: We live on a lovely cul-de-sac street in Pacific Grove which is quiet and cozy.  Please drive slowly on the cul de sac!One block away is the the bus stop.  Two blocks away is Forest Ave. (highway 68) which, if you turn left will take you straight to Ocean Ave. and the beaches. Turn right and you can walk or drive the trail to Cannery Row, Fisherman's Warf and Monterey.  Turn right and it will take you to Asilomar, Pebble Beach, Carmel and eventually Big Sur.  Please park in our driveway.  Please drive slowly in the cul de sac!!!
host_about: My husband and I are retired educators.  We are quiet people renting a Master Bedroom and Bathroom in the second floor of our home.  There is no kitchen as our kitchen is under construction.   Pacific Grove is beautiful and there are great restaurants in town or in Cannery Row.  We are close to the Monterey Bay, and the Aquarium voted the best in the country.  Additionally next to the Aquarium is historic Steinbeck's Cannery Row.  Pacific Grove offers fine restaurants and a quaint downtown, all within walking distance.  We also live less than a mile from Pebble Beach, Spanish Bay's AT&T's Golf Tournament and only 30 miles from Big Sur, one of the most scenic drives is the world.  Visit Monterey and shop Carmel if you have time!  Time Zone  America/San Francisco  WI FI

name: Monthly Town & Forest Retreat
description:
Spacious dog-friendly room with 1/2 bath in a large bay-view property close to town, available for minimum 30 day booking.
Includes use of the kitchen, dining room, living room, yard, and deck!
Walking distance from shopping and restaurants, yet situated in a quiet forest: seclusion when you want it, access when you need it.

The space
Your space is the larger of the two rooms upstairs in a charming home in the wooded neighborhood of Mar Vista park. It has a private half bath, and shared full bath. The base rate covers one room.

Please not that although we welcome dogs, because of past damage, we can no longer allow cats on the premises.

Guest access
Check out is 11 AM. Check in is anytime after 2pm. You have keyless entry through the front door, and you have access to the living room, kitchen, laundry, and deck upstairs. Your dog has free run of the 25,000 square foot fenced in wooded yard.
Breakfast is self serve,
neighborhood_overview:
It is extremely rare to find a large, secluded and quiet wooded property so close to town. This place has the best of both worlds. Seclusion when you need it, and access when you want it.
We are on the low side of the hill on the outer end toward Carmel; high enough to have a birds eye, but low enough to be accessible.
host_about:
Warm, mostly happy, slightly forgetful, completely open, respectful, genuine.
Never at a loss for something to do.

The original house was built in 1904, and was lovingly expanded a few years ago with new modern comforts.

name: Cottage Retreat Steps from the Sea
description:
This sweet, vintage cottage is close to the beach, restaurants and dining, great views, and family-friendly activities. You will love the beautiful light, comfy furnishings, great outdoors space, and quaint and quiet neighborhood. Unfortunately, we can not accept pets.

Pacific Grove License # 0295

The space
Only a short 1/2 block to the sea at Berwick Park and the famed bike path along the Monterey Bay sanctuary. Step out your front door to view the Bay; a short walk to the famous Monterey Bay Aquarium and to downtown Pacific Grove. Two bedrooms and one bathroom with shower/tub. Stocked kitchen with many amenities.

Guest access
You "own" the whole home.
neighborhood_overview: Feel the calming sea breeze in a quiet serene neighborhood.  A quick walk to activities, shopping, restaurants and night life.
host_about: We are Jim and Viveca and we look forward to hosting you at our Cottage Retreat, just steps to the sea!  We have lived in Pacific Grove for over 30 years, and love the friendliness and beauty of our community.  Joy manages our property and lives two minutes away from the house.  She rides bikes, I ride horses and Jim rides waves. Together, we will do our best to make sure your stay at our cottage by the sea is perfect!

name: Guest Quarters Near Asilomar & Pebble Beach #0335
description:
City Lic. #0335. Only 3 blocks from the beach and 2 blocks from Asilomar State Park, we are 1 mile from historic downtown Pacific Grove. Located in a quiet forested neighborhood. Includes use of living & dining rooms and kitchen. Living room features high ceilings and a gas fireplace. Our 1/2 acre wooded lot has fruit trees and a vegetable garden. Note: Access requires 3 steps down from the driveway and 3 steps up to the entry. We comply with Pacific Grove's "Home Share" regulations.

The space
Centrally located for the pleasures of the Monterey Peninsula, we are five blocks from the entrance to Pebble Beach, and ten minutes drive to the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row. Carmel and Monterey's Fisherman's Wharf are both close by, and Big Sur is a breathtaking one hour drive down the coast.

Guest access
You will have use of: a fully equipped kitchen (including: stove; dishwasher; microwave; coffee maker; cooking utensils; silver
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is located in a pine and oak forest.  Between us and the shoreline (about a block away) is a row of sand dunes that shelters our garden from the winds off the ocean.  The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful, with very little traffic..  Asilomar State Park and Conference Grounds (and Asilomar beach) is just around the corner, and the historic Point Pinos Lighthouse (built in 1855) is also an easy 15 minute walk away. The Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary, which give Pacific Grove its title of "Butterfly Town USA" is right in our neighborhood and just a ten minute stroll from our place.

name: Dolphin House *30 day minimum stay* great location
description:
Dolphin House is a quaint, light-filled beach house with a 30 day minimum stay. It is centrally located in a quiet neighborhood a short walk from Downtown Pacific Grove, Monterey Bay Aquarium, restaurants, the coastal recreation trail and beaches. A binder in the kitchen provides information. It provides a great home base for visiting wineries in Carmel Valley, Point Lobos, Carmel, Monterey, Moss Landing, and Salinas.
The house consists of two bedrooms and one bath.

The space
The living room has a gas fireplace which contributes to a cozy space for relaxing and visiting with friends and family after a busy day exploring the area. WIFI and cable TV is available. Enjoy the many restaurants, cook at home in the well equipped kitchen, or use the gas Weber Grill in the backyard ( a patio table and six chairs is provided). Shop at the local, Grove Market or Andronico’s Safeway, Lucky or Trader Joe's, all less than a mile away.
Children are welcome gue
neighborhood_overview: The house is a half mile walk from the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row shops and restaurants. Less than half a mile in the other direction is downtown Pacific Grove with more shops and restaurants.  A binder in the kitchen shows some of your options. Thousands of Monarch Butterflies overwinter (October to March)  in Pacific Grove. You can visit the Butterfly  Sanctuary where they cluster in the trees to conserve heat when the temperature is lower than 55 degrees F.  When they sunlight warms them, they fly off to gather nectar.  You can often see them hanging in the trees or flying about.  Monterey Bay is visible from the house and less than half a mile away.  Beaches (Lovers Point for family beach  play is great), bike and walking/running trails await.  Drive a short way down Highway 1 to Point Lobos for hiking and viewing ocean cliffs or to Carmel Valley for wine tasting.  Take a whale watching cruise in Moss Landing ( Sanctuary Cruises) or try clam chowder sample tasting from M
host_about: My husband and I spent our honeymoon in the Monterey Bay Area in 1969 and fell in love with it.  In 2015 we found this lovely house.  We hope you enjoy the area and our home as much as we do!

name: 1 bed/1.5 bath, 17mi Drive in beautiful location!
description:
Welcome to Beautiful Pebble Beach!
Love Golf? The ocean and the forest?
This is a for a 1 bedroom listing with detached 1.5 private bathrooms. The 2 bathrooms are across and also down the hall.
You will love serenity that is Pebble Beach with the moss filled trees and deer roaming that remind you that you are in the forest!
It’s a ranch style house with amenities in your room such as a fridge, Keurig and snacks.
Room has 2 twin beds that may be kept separate or pushed together for a King!

The space
My room is sunny and bright, with a mini-fridge, Keurig coffee maker, robes, snacks and every possible amenity I can think of to make your stay great. It is outside the kitchen so please realize, this is one of the four bedrooms in my house making this a home share. I am used to sharing my home and offer within the kitchen: the filtered water spigot, the ice maker, microwave or toaster oven in my kitchen. You may also you may eat at the kitchen
neighborhood_overview:
Pebble Beach is central to everything in The Monterey Peninsula. I’m 1 mi from the famous 17 mile drive and also within a few miles of all Pebble Beach attractions. The quaint European walking village of Carmel is a short 10min scenic drive, or check out downtown Pacific Grove, a great American hometown. Like the Beach? Spanish Bay, Stillwater Cove and Carmel beaches are within a few minutes driving and are some of the most beautiful you’ll ever see. Wanna walk?
The 17 mi drive beach trail starts at BirdRock and is a 1 mile walk from the house and tons of nature trails in Pebble. Staying with me also gives you free access through the Pebble Beach gate, which is normally $10.25 for entry into the picturesque landscape that was once a former racetrack, along the world famous 17 mile drive. See all of it! Normal room rates in Pebble start around $800/nite. My house: Sweet and Affordable!
host_about:
Welcome to one of my favorite places in the world: The Monterey Peninsula!
I've lived here 17yrs and loving it!
If you do too, we already share something in common.
I enjoy fitness, healthy living and and quiet living in my large Pebble Beach home. I also have 50% custody of my 9yr old daughter (alternating weekends).  I don't smoke, drink excessively or conduct ourselves in anything other than a normal hard working person that enjoys life, socializing, great food and wine and all the beauty this area has to offer. I make it my mission to help you have the best stay possible. I look forward to being your host in my home.

I'm also a local personal trainer with my own 1500 Sq foot gym and therapeutic/Clinical Massage Therapist. I do work on Saturdays and my gym is 1 MI away. Ask me how you can add a wellness package or single service to your visit!
neighbourhood: Del Monte Forest, California, United States

name: Pacific Grove/Pebble Beach/Monterey/Carmel
description:
Light airy, second story space gives you peak of bay and treetops with skylight/windows. Located next to Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary, this is an 400+- sq ft STUDIO space that is private. Free wifi.

The butterflies have mostly moved on but the humpbacks are here!

Close to Asilomar, Monterey Bay Aquarium and Pebble Beach a relaxing space to unwind after your visit to Carmel or hike in Big Sur.

We are Covid aware and have taken steps to protect you and us. We welcome any questions you have.

The space
Feel like you are in a treehouse in this second story, studio space and have a peek of the bay. Just a mile from the entrance to Pebble Beach and a few blocks from the beach.

Your adventure begins with a spiral staircase that takes you to the landing of your treehouse studio space.

Greeted by a queen bed, we also have a table and chairs for you to work or relax.

We have a whole house water filtration s
neighborhood_overview:
Centrally located to experience Pebble Beach, Monterey and Carmel. A drive around the bay takes you to Santa Cruz and a short drive south leads to Big Sur. The studio has a "peak" of the ocean and you can definitely hear the ocean on most nights. Asilomar is less than a mile away as is the recreation trail to walk, job or ride your bike. On Mondays PG hosts a farmer's market in the evening. Our studio is located in a neighborhood and there is ample street parking.
It is also next to the butterfly sanctuary and all the monarchs are gone you are sure to see deer and make sure you make the time for an adventure on the whale watching boat because there are a lot of humpbacks in the bay!
host_about:
I’ve traveled to 13 countries and 15 states, and that’s just since I was married! I love to travel and want you to feel safe and comfortable. The Treehouse space is active with birds and squirrels and butterflies when in season. You will often see deer out your window.

The Monterey Peninsula is my second favorite discovery spot (Galapagos is my first) and we will share tips with you to get the most out of your visit.

With Covid-19 it can be a scary time and we have put protocols in place that protect us and you.

Cheers! To safe getaways and discovery.

name: No shared space! Private room/bathroom! PGLic#0405
description:
My place is close to Carmel and Monterey, some of the best dining, family-friendly activities, Fisherman's Wharf, Pebble Beach, The 17-mile Drive, Monterey Bay Aquarium, Lover's Point Beach, Downtown Pacific Grove, Downtown Monterey, and Asilomar Beach. Point Lobos is about 10 mins and Big Sur is only 45 mins away!

The space
This is really an entire place to yourself! VERY CLEAN, large spacious bedroom with queen-size sleep number bed and an optional roll-a-way fold-out bed that you can set up. Linens, pillows and blankets provided. There is a TV w/Firestick which has Netflix, Amazon Prime and YouTube. Please see pictures for more info on room. Private bathroom, courtyard, private parking and private entry to room with lock. Room is attached to our home but blocked from any entry/exit into main house. This is really more like having an entire studio to yourself! There is no shared space.

Guest access
Guests have private entry to their ro
neighborhood_overview: We live in a very safe and peaceful neighborhood.  Pacific Grove has an extremely low crime rate. One of the safest places in America! Very family-friendly. It is a residential area, but minutes from all the fun stuff! One mile from the BEACH!  We are only a couple of blocks from Pebble Beach.  Also, there is a beautiful forest a couple of blocks away to take a tranquil walk.
host_about: We are both veterans and have been married for 22 years now.  Josh has been running a moving business for 19 years and Angi is a stay-at-home mother.  We both love Korean, Thai, Japanese, and Mexican food!  Together we host a private room in Pacific Grove, California and love meeting new people and helping enrich their time traveling here.

name: Central to Everything - Casa Mariposa
description:
Casa Mariposa is centrally located in the sunniest part of Pacific Grove, on a quiet street within walking distance of the Ocean, Cannery Row, Lovers Point, Asilomar Beach, Spanish Bay, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and much more. We are near Washington Park and the Monarch butterfly sanctuary. Sorry - no pets, no smoking, and no loud parties. *IMPORTANT NOTE: We no longer rent our home for less than 30 days.

The space
Our home boasts many green attributes: It has a state-of-the-art solar system installed on the roof which powers all of the home electrical needs. It also has a sophisticated rain-water catchment system which allows us to conserve drinking water by using rainwater for the gardens. South-facing windows capture the sun and we have energy efficient lighting throughout.

We live in a nice quiet neighborhood central to everything on the Peninsula. Two formal bedrooms (one queen and one king bed) plus a queen size sleep sofa and
neighborhood_overview: Casa Mariposa is centrally located in a quiet sunny neighborhood of Pacific Grove.  We are within walking distance of the Ocean, Cannery Row, Lovers Point, Asilomar Beach, Spanish Bay, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and much more.  Also near Washington Park and the Monarch butterfly sanctuary.
host_about: Casa Mariposa is the home of Julie Martinez and Jon Kramer, globe-trotting adventurers with natural history backgrounds and a passion for Earth and all its incredible worlds and cultures.  Julie is a natural history illustrator and art instructor.  Jon is a geological engineer and solar energy developer.  Together they author adventure guidebooks.  You will see some of Julie’s art on these walls and their joint adventure guidebooks on the shelves.  Many fossils and rocks from their various geologic adventures are displayed throughout the property.

name: Heart of PG Cottage
description:
Due to COVID lockdown from December 2020-January 11, 2021, only essential workers allowed who are working outside the rental home (not working from home). This cottage is a half block from the town grocery store, a few houses away from cottages converted into restaurants and bakeries.. Near Lover's Point beach (Pacific Grove City STR Permit #0365.) We do not take pets and do not make exceptions unless they meet ADA legalities

The space
One bedroom has doors for privacy but two of the sleeping rooms have curtains instead of doors. Lots of windows make this cottage bright and cozy at the same time. It is in the commercial district where all the Victorian homes have been turned into cafes and coffee shops. A couple of blocks to the beach at Lover's Point. The bathroom is between the two bedrooms so if someone is using the twin beds in the bonus room, they'd have to cross into one of the bedrooms to enter the bathroom. There's a small refrigerator and another medium
neighborhood_overview: The cottage is surrounded by Victorians that are a century old. It is a sleepy town at night with the grocery story closing at 7 and not opening until 8.  You are steps from coffee shops and cafes.

License 0350

The space
This is a home built in 2014. All the furnishings for the home were purchased in November of 2016. Brand new bedroom furniture, mattresses, living room and dining set. We rent out the house less than 90 days per year.

name: Lovers Point Beach House, Perfect Location #0125
description:
Imagine, less than 30 steps from Lover's Point Beach and the Peninsula's scenic bike path is where you will find this charming and cozy beach house - vaulted open-beam ceilings, wood burning stove, and Honduras mahogany wood floors in the kitchen are just a few of the amenities. The house is fully equipped with everything you will need for your stay and is within walking distance to the Beach, Aquarium, Cannery Row, Old Fishermans Wharf, Kayak and Bike Rentals, and Endless food options.

The space
The upstairs/downstairs floor plan makes it perfect for families and couples to gather. Upon entering the house on the first level there is a master bedroom with sliding glass doors leading out to a small patio in a fenced in backyard. There is laundry room, as well as, an additional bonus living area with two futons and a flat screen TV. This downstairs suite along with the upstairs with 2 bedrooms, a bath, and great room with TV, fully equipped kitchen, and eating area

The ocean views are spectacular, you can hear waves crashing from every room. Kitchen is well-stocked, walk or short drive to downtown and restaurants.

Pacific Grove is one of my favorite places in the world.  I first fell in love with this small town about 15 years ago when I accidentally stumbled upon it when I was looking for a place for dinner.

I am a venture seeker.  I am an adventurer at heart and a foodie.  

I look forward to hosting you in my home!
