Ideally located: 2 minute walk to Lover’s Point & beach. 10 minutes walk to world-famous Monterey Bay Aquarium and historic Cannery Row. Close to Pebble Beach, Carmel and Big Sur.

The space
Garden Suite is designed with romance in mind and often referred to as "Honeymoon Suite".

The Garden Suite features a draw string canopy bed, unique pot belly fireplace, wet bar, mini fridge, TV, sitting area and a large bathroom with a whirlpool jacuzzi tub for two. This room is specially designed and decorated, perfect for a romantic and intimate getaway to celebrate that special occasion.

neighborhood_overview:

name: Lovely Forest Home on One Acre in Pacific Grove
description:
Clean and spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath home in beautiful Pacific Grove, CA. Accommodates 4 adults and 2+ children. Queen bed in master bedroom, Full bed in second bedroom, Pull-out queen sofa bed in living room. 10 min. walk to beautiful Asilomar Beach with white sand, gorgeous views, and amazing dog beach. Located between Monterey and Carmel on a large (1 acre) forested lot with fire pit and outdoor dining. Just a few min. drive to the entrance gate of scenic, 17 Mile Drive. Pet friendly.

The space
This ultra clean home is turn-key ready for your stay. It is fully stocked with everything that you will need for cooking, towels and bedding, and bathroom convenience items. It is truly a home away from home on a gorgeous 1 acre forest lot. It has excellent cable and wifi services, a very large and comfortable living room with lots of seating, updated features and designer touches and television in the bedrooms and living room. Outside is a dining patio with a barbequ
neighborhood_overview: The house is set back from the road and is very quiet and peaceful.  There are nature trails and walks nearby, including the beautiful coastal path along Oceanview Ave. It is a short five minute drive to the restaurants and shops at Cannery Row, the Monterey Bay Aquarium, and another few minutes from there to the Monterey Wharf.  It is close to all of the attractions on the Monterey Peninsula, yet tucked into a sleepy forest neighborhood. At night you can sit at the firepit and stargaze while listening to the ocean waves washing ashore. It is truly amazing!
host_about: We fell in love with Pacific Grove while attending the annual Monterey Car week in 2015. We purchased two PG homes later that year, which we now operate as Airbnbs. We have just added our Huntington Harbor home as an AIRBNB rental.  All three homes are wonderful properties and we have many repeat guests.

name: Spectacular Views - Walk to Cannery Row and the Aquarium
description:
Welcome to Monterey's Bay Views!

Due to City of Monterey Ordnance, all leases require a 31-night minimum.

Bay Views is a contemporary four (4) bedroom, two (2) bath home. Upon arriving, Guests are treated to panoramic views of the Monterey Bay. You may see the expansive Monterey Bay views throughout the house and soak up sun plus the best of the views on a private deck.

A convenient location puts you close to everything! The Monterey Bay Aquarium is just down the street, while a convenience store, grocery store, pizzeria, and the famous Cannery Row shops and restaurants are all walking distance from your rental.

Whale watching tours, the world renown golf courses of Pebble Beach, sandy beaches, oceanside walks and the Monterey- Pacific Grove Recreation path are all within minutes.

Natural light and bay views await in a fantastic entertaining space on the main floor. Updated furnishings and appliances include a c
neighborhood_overview:
The Monterey Peninsula is different than any other part of California. Here, time slows, the architecture is humble (with the exception of the homes in Pebble Beach), and the lifestyle is the perfect synthesis of SoCal laid back and NorCal sophisticated. On the northern side of the peninsula, the town of Monterey draws most of the tourists, while farther south, Carmel-by-the-Sea lures the easygoing wealthy set. Tremendous price tags on real estate helps maintain the small-community atmosphere along Monterey's jaw-dropping coastline.

This area makes for a tremendous road-trip stop or romantic weekend stay. And did we mention the golf courses? This stretch of the California coastline boasts some of the most coveted fairways in the world. Add to than an abundance of natural wonders, luxury resorts and seafood restaurants, and Monterey might just be the ideal destination for your next getaway.
host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

You may see MaryJane's 149 Guest Reviews from the original Host Account.

host_about:
I lead social media for a global insurance company and my husband Sal heads up software architecture for a finance company. We have two kiddos and a dog. 

I really like being involved with AirBnB and have participated in several conferences and projects with them, because they do a good job of looping in hosts from the Bay Area.

We are grateful for our family homes on Monterey Bay and in Lake Tahoe and enjoy sharing them with other families. We would also love to share our Sausalito home, one day.

I'm always happy to offer tips on restaurants and things to do in at any one of our places.

I post from @donnerbliss and @tripmogul on IG, sharing what's new and exciting on the Truckee, LakeTahoe, PacificGrove, Monterey and Sausalito hashtags. We love connecting with our guests, helping them with their plans and then hearing how their stays were. 

Looking forward to sharing our place with you!

Welcome to Hillcrest Haven!



This updated Pacific Grove home shows pride of ownership and lots of extras! There is room for everyone in this 4 bed, 2.5 bath home with over 2067 square feet of living space.

Hillcrest features an open kitchen, living room and dining area that bask in the sunshine and welcome you to this very special home.

The updated kitchen, remodeled bath, new flooring are just a few recent upgrades! Close to Pacific Grove's  downtown stores and resturaunts.

Your hosts have provided the services of Carmel Coast Estate, Inc a locally owned and operated full service Real Estate and Property Management company. Your Property Managers are available by cellular phone, text messaging and email during your visit.

Here at Carmel Coast Estate, we take every measure t
neighborhood_overview:
Coast Estate invites you to experience the beautiful Monterey Peninsula and California Central Coast. The are is world renown for spectacular coastlines, unique coastal communities, and rich marine life. Coast Estate specializes in Luxury Vacation Rentals in Big Sur, Carmel, Carmel Highlands, Carmel Valley, Pacific Grove, Pebble Beach, Monterey and Seaside.

Local residents and visitors alike refer to Pacific Grove as “America’s last Hometown” and the “Butterfly Capital of California”, due to the annual migration of the Monarch butterflies. Pacific Grove is known for well kept Victorian homes and amazing seascapes along the scenic Sunset Drive.

Asilomar State Beach offers visitors beach and coast trail walks and a short, accessible boardwalk loop through the Asilomar Dunes Natural Preserve. The Point Pinos Lighthouse is the oldest continuously operating lighthouse on the West Coast and may be toured in the afternoon.

There are 3 rooms in the house which means usually 3 people share the space with a cat and a small doggie that love caring touch.

The space
You will feel welcome and comfortable in this peaceful, clean and uncluttered space.
My home is my sanctuary and love to share with travelers that are looking for a space to work and rest.
In the kitchen - each guest has its own cabinets with dishes and drawer with cutlery.

neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: Elegance in the Forest
description:
This private room with a private connected bathroom is spacious. Enjoy your morning coffee on the private balcony. Our home is located on a quiet cul-de-sac nestled among the trees and other beautiful homes in a forested area. Deer are often seen wandering about and occasionally you hear a fog horn in the distance. The home is centrally located as it is easy to reach many great sights/places on the Peninsula, including the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Big Sur, Pebble Beach & Carmel-by-the-Sea.

The space
Your room will have its private little balcony and private bathroom

Guest access
You will have access to your room, your balcony, your bathroom, the living room, the kitchen, & the dining area.

Other things to note
Great location for travel nurses as we are a 5-min drive to CHOMP (hospital).
neighborhood_overview: Quiet cul-de-sac in the forest
host_about:
I am easy-going and enjoy meeting new people.   I love snow skiing, tennis, hiking, traveling, and hanging out with family/friends. My favorite travel destinations are NZ, Ireland, England, Idaho, Montana, Washington, and Alaska - - all gorgeous w/fabulous people! 

Skip is from the Oregon/Washington area.  We are working professionals.  Depending on our workloads, we may not be around much. We hope you feel at home in our home!  And if we are in your home, please be assured we will treat it like it is our own, i.e., with care, respect, and cleanliness!  I have learned from my parents and live by it: "If you borrow something, return it in better condition than you found it."

neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: Large Pebble home 2.5 mi top beaches & Golf course
description:
Love to golf? Captivated by the ocean? With endless coastlines of beaches and wind-swept points overlooking surrounding golf courses, Pebble Beach continually tops "Best Of" lists in golf & resort venues. With 9 championship courses, Pebble Beach is the #1 Public Golf course in the US. We're less then 2.5 miles away! This spacious 2414 sq ft 4/3 retreat with soaring ceilings and magnificent walls of glass, looks to the beautiful Del Monte forest. Located near miles of hiking & biking trails.

The space
Come stay in our lovely Pebble Beach 4 bedroom, 3 bath home on a large wooded lot! Our huge windows let in the sunshine and makes it easy to admire the spectacular views of Del Monte Forest. Located on the 17-mile Drive, just off a country lane in the gated golfing community of Pebble Beach, the Ocean Crest Beach House is conveniently located less then 2.5 miles from Carmel Beach and famous Pebble Beach Golf course, the #1 public golf course in the US.

description:
Located in the heart of Pebble Beach and a short walk from the beach, this modern bungalow offers guests a private retreat with an ocean view. Equipped with a custom putting green in the front yard, a Brunswick professional pool table, and located minutes walking from the beach, this home is the perfect place to quarantine. We have several board games, a smart TV, and record player to help pass the time.The house is accessible via keypad entry and the property is completely fenced in.

Other things to note
Please note that we do not allow pets or gatherings over 6 people. If rules are not honored, guests will be asked to leave and will not receive a refund from the host. It is significant to note that due to some bad apples in the past, we are enforcing rules with greater scrutiny, and ask for honesty and transparency in an effort to help honor and preserve the tranquility of the community. Thank you for respecting our community!

neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a very quiet seaside town with excellent restaurants within walking distance from Seven Gables, a biking and hiking trail running for miles along the oceanfront and spectacular natural scenery.  Pacific Grove and Monterey are right next to each other.  Carmel is just a short 5 mile drive away.
host_about:
As of June 23rd 2021, The Seven Gables Inn is managed by the Kirkwood Collection. 

Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982 and since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Innkeeping. 

For all reservation questions please feel free to send us a message as we will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total 25 individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom and many with private outside entrances that only you would use. 

Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. 

Each room has a Keurig beverage maker.

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, The Kirkwood Collection and Staff 

Note: This information was updated on August 13th 2021

name: Three Mermaid’s Cove Modern Penthouse at the Beach
description:
Three Mermaid’s Cove is located on the desirable Mermaid Avenue in Pacific Grove. This modern Penthouse provides views of the ocean and is just steps away from Ocean View Boulevard’s majestic ocean front. Take a walk down to the end of the street to Lover's Point Beach or take a stroll a few blocks up to town and enjoy a multitude of wonderful restaurants, great coffee, and PG’s quaint neighborhood. Experience PG like a local! Only a short distance to the Aquarium, Monterey, and Carmel.

The space
Three Mermaid's Cove is a stylish Penthouse in a Triplex. Upon entering the common area shared with the downstairs unit there are 15 steps leading to the entry of the Penthouse. Upon entry, you are greeted with floor to ceiling windows with peaks of the bay. Enjoy the view from the living room, gourmet kitchen, and balcony. The balcony is the perfect place to enjoy an outdoor meal or take in the morning sunshine with a cup of tea while listening to the symphony of t
neighborhood_overview:
“Mermaid Crossing” is located on Mermaid Ave. the premier destination for those who want easy (walking or biking) access to all the conveniences and attractions but would rather enjoy the quiet serenity this zone provides. At Mermaid Crossing, you can park the car and forget about it. Walk out the front door and take 70 steps until your toes touch the water at famous Lover’s Point, a calm swimming beach during the summer that boasts great surfing during the winter months. Take in the jaw-dropping views of the entire Monterey Bay as you stroll along the Monterey Recreation trail to the front doors of the world renowned Monterey Bay Aquarium.
Great dining options abound the closest being the historic Beach House at Lover’s Point which has a full bar (open late) and gourmet seafood. Bringing your clubs? The Pacific Grove Municipal Golf Links is quite literally, in your backyard. Enjoy it’s stellar reputation as one of the “Nation’s Top 50 Gold Courses under $50.00” by Golf Digest. O
host_about:
Rhonda is the managing broker of Pacific Grove Property Management. Their goal is to make your stay with them pleasurable enough to leave you longing to come back! They love where they live and can't wait to share it with you!

neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

description:
This home is a half-block from the beach! 10-minute walk to the famous Monterey Bay Aquarium. 10-minute walk to downtown Pacific Grove where many top restaurants and fun shops are located. The home has a fully-equipped kitchen, Natuzzi Italian Sectional Leather Sofa, and large windows throughout the home in every room. High-speed internet with a brand new 55" 4K Samsung Smart TV. neighborhood_overview: Very nice neighbors, they are quiet, peaceful and respectful. Please pay respect to the neighbors as well. Thank you very much for your cooporation!
host_about:
I am a working professional in Silicon Valley with a passion for interior design and the hospitality industry. Since 2017, I joined Airbnb as a host and managed my first Airbnb property. Ever since then, I have never stopped creating more and more unique homes for my Airbnb guests. Up to this point, we are offering more than 18 properties in the Bay Area and California Coastal area. Each property has its unique interior design and furniture layout. My goal for each property is to provide the most comfortable stays and amazing experience for all of my guests.  

When I travel, I always stay at Airbnb properties. I personally have very high expectations when staying away from home and I hope all my properties meet yours, knowing you are traveling away from your home. My team members include my partner, Carrie, a customer service crew, a cleaning crew and a repair / handyman crew. They are on call 7-days a week at your service. We strive to exceed expectations to all of our guests with the utmost respect and respond. We will ensure each property is thoroughly cleaned with enhanced cleaning protocols, and with fresh bed sheets, towels, and bath rugs upon your arrival. 

I hand picked all of the furniture, bed sheets and kitchen equipment for each of our properties. I want to make sure everything my guests use is high quality with a unique style to allow them fully enjoy the space, because my guests deserve the best!

I am also an active member of Airbnb.org which is a non-profit organization started by the founders of Airbnb. In a daily basis, I donate a certain percentage of my revenue from each guest's booking to Airbnb.org. Our mission is to unlock the power of sharing space, resources, and support in times of needs! We partner with the worldwide communities to open housing in emergencies in order to  provide shelters for people who lost their homes. 

Thank you! My team and I look forward to hosting you in the near future!

Easy living in this remodeled luxurious three-bedroom, two-bath home in the Beach Tract of Pacific Grove.

The open concept floor plan seamlessly flows from the living area to the kitchen and dining area where sliding glass doors open up to the expansive rear deck, the perfect place to unwind listening to the crashing waves.

Step out your room every morning onto the private balcony and enjoy the fresh o
neighborhood_overview:
Coast Estate invites you to experience the beautiful Monterey Peninsula and California Central Coast. The are is world renown for spectacular coastlines, unique coastal communities, and rich marine life. Coast Estate specializes in Luxury Vacation Rentals in Big Sur, Carmel, Carmel Highlands, Carmel Valley, Pacific Grove, Pebble Beach, Monterey and Seaside.

Local residents and visitors alike refer to Pacific Grove as “America’s last Hometown” and the “Butterfly Capital of California”, due to the annual migration of the Monarch butterflies. Pacific Grove is known for well kept Victorian homes and amazing seascapes along the scenic Sunset Drive.

Asilomar State Beach offers visitors beach and coast trail walks and a short, accessible boardwalk loop through the Asilomar Dunes Natural Preserve. The Point Pinos Lighthouse is the oldest continuously operating lighthouse on the West Coast and may be toured in the afternoon.

Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: Beautiful Updated Pebble Beach Three Bed 2 1/2 Bath
description:
Welcome to Pebble Beach's Casa Azul!



Freshly updated, Casa Azul is located in the coveted Country Club East area of Pebble Beach, adjoining the SFB Morse Botanical Preserve and it's many miles of hiking trails.   This home is mere minutes from neighboring Pacific Grove, Carmel and Monterey.

World Class Golf awaits at Poppy Hills, Spanish Bay and the Pebble Beach Golf Links. Join a Fishing or Whale Watching Excursion.  Drive the world  renown California Highway One to Point Lobos, the Bixby Bridge and Big Sur.  Visit the World Wonder that is the Monterey Bay Aquarium.

On arriving at Casa Azul, Guests will find this private and welcoming, single-level home offers a spacious floor plan. Featuring three bedrooms and two and a half bathrooms this Del Mote Forest home features vaulted ceilings in the living room with a fireplace, separate dining room, and an eat-in kitchen.

Complete with an attached double car garage an
neighborhood_overview:
Coast Estate invites you to experience the beautiful Monterey Peninsula and California Central Coast. The are is world renown for spectacular coastlines, unique coastal communities, and rich marine life. Coast Estate specializes in Luxury Vacation Rentals in Big Sur, Carmel, Carmel Highlands, Carmel Valley, Pacific Grove, Pebble Beach, Monterey and Seaside.

Pebble Beach is more than any Golfer could ever dream of, with eight Championship golf courses. Locals and visitors alike flock to 17 Mile Drive, one of the best-known and most spectacular scenic drives in the world. Cypress Point Club, Monterey Peninsula Dunes Golf Course, Pebble Beach Golf Links, Poppy Hills, Spyglass Hill Golf Course and The Links at Spanish Bay are all within 10 to 15 minutes driving distance from any point in the Del Monte Forest.

There are also miles of hiking, bicycling and equestrian trails that wind through the scenic Del Monte Forest. Fine dining is available at The Lodge at P
host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

You may see MaryJane's 149 Guest Reviews from the original Host Account.

neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a very quiet seaside town with excellent restaurants within walking distance from Seven Gables, a biking and hiking trail running for miles along the oceanfront and spectacular natural scenery. Pacific Grove and Monterey are right next to each other. Carmel is just a short 5 mile drive away.
host_about:
As of June 23rd 2021, The Seven Gables Inn is managed by the Kirkwood Collection. 

Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982 and since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Innkeeping. 

For all reservation questions please feel free to send us a message as we will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total 25 individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom and many with private outside entrances that only you would use. 

Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. 

Each room has a Keurig beverage maker.

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, The Kirkwood Collection and Staff 

Note: This information was updated on August 13th 2021

neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: Beautiful four bedroom with Bay Views
description:
Welcome to Monterey's Wave-n-Sea!

Located above Cannery Row and the Monterey Bay Aquarium in a very desirable neighborhood, close to local beaches and the Monterey Recreation Trail for walking or biking along the ocean, this home offers you the quintessential peninsula lifestyle!

Monterey's Wave-n-Sea is a lovely, modern four (4) bedroom, two (2) bath home. New beds and luxury linens invite you to a restful slumber every night.

The Kitchen features granite counter-tops, ample storage space, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar.

Monterey Wave-n-Sea;s dining area is accoutered with a glass top dining table.

The living room has a large, comfortable sectional sofa, gas fireplace and large SMART TV, a bedroom and full bathroom complete the downstairs. Hardwood floors, dual-paned windows and golden tones throughout this home keep it feeling warm and cozy.

Upstairs you will find another bedr
neighborhood_overview:
The Monterey Peninsula is different than any other part of California. Here, time slows, the architecture is humble (with the exception of the homes in Pebble Beach), and the lifestyle is the perfect synthesis of SoCal laid back and NorCal sophisticated. On the northern side of the peninsula, the town of Monterey draws most of the tourists, while farther south, Carmel-by-the-Sea lures the easygoing wealthy set. Tremendous price tags on real estate helps maintain the small-community atmosphere along Monterey's jaw-dropping coastline.

This area makes for a tremendous road-trip stop or romantic weekend stay. And did we mention the golf courses? This stretch of the California coastline boasts some of the most coveted fairways in the world. Add to than an abundance of natural wonders, luxury resorts and seafood restaurants, and Monterey might just be the ideal destination for your next getaway.
host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

Our furnished 2 bedroom 1 bath home includes fully equipped kitchen, outdoor fenced areas, outdoor living space, solar, wifi with smart TV, EV charger, parking, storage, and some recreational gear for the beach. Backyard is shared with a 1 bedroom studio that may or may not be occupied.

The space
Home is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home. Bedrooms have a queen bed, closet, and windows. 1 bedroom has a built in desk. Living and kitchen is open floor plan. Bathroom is old with character.

Guest access
Home has parking and is easily accessed.

Other things to note
Home is accessed through the front gate and yard. Carport is shared but space is reserved for studio should guests be there.

This quiet home is located within easy walking distance of downtown Pacific Grove. Lovers Point Beach is an easy 1/2 mi. walk and Asilomar Marine Reserve is 1 mi. away. Monterey Bay Aquarium is a 30 minute walk along the ocean.

name: Historic "Blue Cottage"   (30 DAY MINIMUM STAY)
description:
Our cottage is quite unique, having originally been a Portuguese fisherman's home back in the 1920's.
Our quirky back yard is a joy to behold with oodles of succulents, a very characterful oak tree, and a "Juliet Balcony" in a tranquil setting.

The space
There are two cozy bedrooms seperated by a stylish
upgraded bathroom. Both bedrooms have "Pillow-Top" Queen beds covered with duvets. There is plenty of storage space -with drawers, closet space , night stands with lamps. A dressing table with a mirror and chair is situated in the corner. Each bedroom has 2 windows with blinds and attractive window coverings. Floors are hardwood with rugs. There are two TV's - one in the living room and one in the bedroom. The living room has high lofted beams, fireplace and windows facing east that attracts the morning sun. The kitchen encompasses the dining table with a new refrigerator/freezer. There is plenty of cabinet space stocked with everything a
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood of New Monterey is full of interesting historic cottages
and a smattering of newer homes. Scattered amoungst the properties are many Monterey pines and mature oak trees that give the area an established "close to nature" feel.
host_about: Active, Golfer, traveler and enjoy people and life!

This 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental offers the ideal crashing spot after days of surfing at Del Monte Beach, experiencing Old Fisherman's Wharf, or snapping photos at Pescadero Point. You'll adore the beachy feel of this hideaway, complete with a full kitchen, a Smart TV, a balcony with bay views, and alluring bedrooms for a restful night's sleep.

The space
Remote-Work Friendly | Walk to Old Fisherman's Wharf | Beach Bungalow Vibe

Treat your family to a hassle-free trip to the Golden State when you stay at this convenient apartment, located just a few blocks from beaches, downtown Monterey, and the wharf.

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: 2 Twin Beds | Living Room: Sleeper Sofa

Weekly stays may be possible, please inquire if interested. Note, 2000 security deposit, fully refunded minus actual gas, electric and water used (30+ day stay).

The space
Beach cottage outside, mid-century modern inside. Newly furnished with West Elm mid-century furniture and premium mattresses, bedding, and towels. New appliances have been installed. Watch for new pictures as furniture comes in. All new stainless appliances, including gas range, and well-appointed kitchen. Master bedroom features a king bed, guest room includes a queen bed, and upstairs bedroom also has a queen bed (and views). Free internet. Trash pickup is on Monda

name: New Three Bed 3 Bath overlooking MPCC Fairway
description:
If you are looking for a peaceful, light and airy space to relax, San Carlos is the home for you. Resting along the 2nd fairway of the exclusive MPCC golf course, this southwest facing, quiet vacation sanctuary not only boasts of a golf course view to help you breathe well, but also features peeks of the ocean and gorgeous sunsets from the living/dining room and outdoor patio!

Newly constructed, San Carlos features a spacious, well equipped gourmet kitchen for the home chef and home baker to enjoy. The single level layout is perfect for family to get together, play games and watch movies in the living/dining and while popping popcorn in the kitchen.

Savor a good night’s sleep in San Carlos’ 3 bedrooms (1 king, 2 twins or 1 king, 1 queen). 3 bathrooms keeps vacationers comfortable during the stay. The masters features a tub to melt all your concerns away after zoom meetings in the home’s den/office or after a golf game or after a leisurely walk to the bea
neighborhood_overview:
Coast Estate invites you to experience the beautiful Monterey Peninsula and California Central Coast. The are is world renown for spectacular coastlines, unique coastal communities, and rich marine life. Coast Estate specializes in Luxury Vacation Rentals in Big Sur, Carmel, Carmel Highlands, Carmel Valley, Pacific Grove, Pebble Beach, Monterey and Seaside.

Pebble Beach is more than any Golfer could ever dream of, with eight Championship golf courses. Locals and visitors alike flock to 17 Mile Drive, one of the best-known and most spectacular scenic drives in the world. Cypress Point Club, Monterey Peninsula Dunes Golf Course, Pebble Beach Golf Links, Poppy Hills, Spyglass Hill Golf Course and The Links at Spanish Bay are all within 10 to 15 minutes driving distance from any point in the Del Monte Forest.

There are also miles of hiking, bicycling and equestrian trails that wind through the scenic Del Monte Forest. Fine dining is available at The Lodge at P
host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

You may see MaryJane's 149 Guest Reviews from the original Host Account.

Welcome to Mermaid Hideaway! This home sleeps up to 3 guests.

When taking liberties with an old adage, “extraordinary things come in small packages,” it aptly applies to this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom oasis.

The space
Its 445 square-feet of space is beautifully-appointed with hues and art that evoke the ocean that lies within view. There’s no shortage of amenities, conveniences and special touches that make this a beach home away from home. This is one half of a duplex unit, accessed on the second floor.

The home is situated on a one-way lane—tucked away from the busy streets—lined with charming cottages. Walk up several steps to the deck and enter through a sliding glass door that is also your window on the Bay. A
neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: Alice House: Near Cannery Row/Pacific Grove, Views
description:
Located 1 mile above Cannery Row and the Monterey Bay Aquarium, with peeks of the ocean through the trees, and quaint downtown Pacific Grove less than 1.5 miles away, Alice House welcomes you to all that the Monterey Peninsula has to offer. Close to local beaches, including Lover’s Point, the Monterey Recreation Trail for walking or biking along the ocean, the Pebble Beach Golf Links, and monarch butterfly sanctuaries, it’s just a short commute to CHOMP, DLI, and Presidio of Monterey.

The space
Given the 30-day minimum requirement for City of Monterey, Alice House is set up for traveling professionals, students, longer term vacations, and those with home repairs in their primary residence or who are escaping weather events.

The home is a lovely, vintage-turned-modern one (1) bedroom, two (2) bath cottage that sleeps up to 4.

The fully equipped and recently updated kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, ample stora

host_about:
We look forward to hosting you at Alice House! We fell in love with the beauty of the Monterey Peninsula on our very first visit and know you will as well.

Given the 30-day minimum requirement for City of Monterey, Alice House is set up for traveling professionals, students, longer term vacations, and those with home repairs in their primary residence or who are escaping weather events. We are available for questions and special requests, just message us!

And if you're looking for a getaway in the Shasta Cascade region in Northern California, book a stay at our family friendly mill home rental, Quincy House: https://airbnb.com/h/mccloudquincyhouseupper

name: Walk to downtown and the beach - Emerald Retreat
description:
New on Airbnb! Stay in town at the light filled Emerald retreat, steps from all the attractions. Walk to Pacific Grove's charming downtown and Lover's Point, or hop over to the Aquarium or the Links in Pebble Beach in less than 5 minutes. This light, bright, 1355 sq ft, 3 br/1 bath home is situated "above the street" with peeks of the Bay from the front deck! Premium furniture, open dining and living rooms, gleaming kitchen and 3 spacious bedrooms. Minimum 30 day stay per Pacific Grove law.

The space
This beautiful home, nestled right in the quaint downtown of Pacific grove offers 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. Incredibly central location, enjoy fine dining and restaurants just two blocks away. Walk to Lover's Point beach and the coastal recreation trail in 7 minutes, Or take a short jaunt to catch the sunset at Asilomar beach, and under 10 min drive to Monterey, Pebble Beach, and Carmel-By-The-Sea.

name: Pet friendly Historic PG
description: Historic home one block from downtown and three blocks from beach. King bed, washer dryer, high speed wifi, two pets welcome, driveway.
neighborhood_overview: Quaint and quiet historic victorians one block from downtown and three blocks to Lover's Point beach.
host_about: Local artist who also works as an occupational therapist specializing in pain management. name: Beach Cottage - walk to ocean and restaurants
description:
This 1,100 sq. ft. cottage is one block to Lovers Point beach. Comfortably sleeps five in the peaceful town of Pacific Grove California. Close to Monterey Bay Aquarium, Fisherman's Wharf, Pebble Beach, 17-Mile Drive, Pacific Grove Golf Links and all the great Monterey Peninsula activities.

Cottage includes a family room and living room to watch a movie, play board games or read a book.

Private backyard with comfortable seating, space heater, lights and BBQ for grilling. License #0479

The space
Bedroom 1 - Spacious master bedroom with king bed, en suite bathroom with shower. Large closet and dresser.

Bedroom 2 - queen bed with closet and dresser. Cozy room to read and relax.

Bathroom 1: In master bedroom - with shower and vanity.

Bathroom 2: Full bathroom in hallway with shower and vanity. It’s small and has all you need.

Full kitchen - with all the appliances you will need

Family roo
neighborhood_overview: Charming neighborhood with homes in close proximity to each other. Neighbors are friendly and welcoming. Restaurants, shops, market and beach in walking distance. Cannery Row and the Monterey Aquarium are a mile away. Pebble Beach and Carmel by the Sea close by.
host_about: My wife Maureen and I are avid tennis players. I enjoy DIY projects and the sense of accomplishment it gives me.

name: Welcome to Sea-Glass House! 1BR (PG License #0478)
description:
Enjoy a waterfront bay view from your private spaces (including a bedroom, a deck overlooking the bay, and a spacious bathroom) in a shared house. This stylish place to stay is perfect for couples or someone coming to town for work who wants to maximize their time actually at the waters edge. Sea-Glass House is less than 10 min drive to area’s most popular attractions. Deck is perfect for dinning or having a glass of wine. Depending on the season, watch whales, dolphins, and otters swim by!

The space
This property is modern, built in 1989, has high ceilings, open spaces and lots of large windows to view the Bay, which is very close. This house is all about location and views.

The fully private guest room is upstairs, has a vaulted pitched ceiling with big windows for lots of light. We have 2 end tables with lamps, and an additional end table with 2 drawers, built in shelves for clothing and a suitcase rack. Built in table top cupboards are useful fo
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in a beautiful charming neighborhood and are second row from the Bay. We have a tiny adobe bungalo house in front of us that allows us spectacular Bay views. We have our own private path directly to the Bay. You can walk the incredibly gorgeous beach path (just steps from our house) to most tourist attractions. Driving times are : 3 minutes drive to Lovers Point,
6 minute drive to the Aquarium & Cannery Row, 6 minute drive to Asilomar Beach for amazing sunsets! There is a great quiet beach for kids just a five minute walk from the house called Anchors Away Beach. The beach in front of our house is rocky and has cool tide pools!

name: #JewelboxCottages🏖CARRIAGE HOUSE👑Queen🛁PrivateBath
description:
Looking for a taste of sea air while working remotely? We are set up with wi-fi, a desk, and plenty of outdoor space to spread out in.

Enjoy our Carriage House, monthly, as a stand-alone (separate from the Main Cottage) in the shared courtyard.

Pet-friendly. Wrought iron bed. Private bath. Shared outdoor space with fire pit and outdoor seating and dining. Great for remote work and nurses.

You'll feel relaxed right away in this beachy Victorian gem.

Inquire about our light food prep space.
neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
I lead social media for a global insurance company and my husband Sal heads up software architecture for a finance company. We have two kiddos and a dog. 

I really like being involved with AirBnB and have participated in several conferences and projects with them, because they do a good job of looping in hosts from the Bay Area.

We are grateful for our family homes on Monterey Bay and in Lake Tahoe and enjoy sharing them with other families. We would also love to share our Sausalito home, one day.

I'm always happy to offer tips on restaurants and things to do in at any one of our places.

I post from @donnerbliss and @tripmogul on IG, sharing what's new and exciting on the Truckee, LakeTahoe, PacificGrove, Monterey and Sausalito hashtags. We love connecting with our guests, helping them with their plans and then hearing how their stays were. 

Looking forward to sharing our place with you!

description:
This unit is a monthly rental. We request that all nights of your stay are within the same month. Some exceptions may be made, with the approval of our team and the homeowner. Payment of a Security Deposit via credit card to Sanctuary Vacation Rentals will be required at time of booking. Please refer to our House Rules for further information. 1057 sf, 3 bedroom, 2 bath vacation home sleeps up to 6 adults and 2 children, 3 king beds, twin daybed with twin trundle bed. Dog OK. No garage.

The space
Walk to the Monterey Bay Aquarium from this outstanding location.

Tranquil views of Monterey Bay beckon from virtually every room in this lovely 1057 square feet 3-bedroom, 2-bath hilltop home in a friendly Pacific Grove neighborhood within walking distance of the coastline and the Monterey Bay Aquarium. The location is ideal, just blocks from downtown Pacific Grove shops and restaurants, and the 15-mile walking and bike trail that winds along the shorelin
neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: 3067 Sq Ft 3BR 2 1/2BA Ten Minute Walk to the Shore
description:
Welcome to Pebble Beach's Secret Garden!!

Centrally located to Pebble Beach, Carmel-by-the-Sea, Monterey and Pacific Grove, all of the
activities, sites, natural beauty and history of the Monterey Peninsula are easily available.

Only three blocks to the shore, this home is part of an exclusive, gated, coastal community with beautiful beaches, world-class golf courses, wonderful restaurants, walking, hiking, and bike trails galore.

Pebble Beach's Secret Garden is within easy walking distance to the beach, you are sure to be inspired by a morning stroll. Enjoy the ocean mist filtered by rays of sunlight and white capped waves glistening along the ocean headland path where you will most assuredly spot sea otters, blue herons, egrets and sandpipers. Weave your way past both cozy and expansive beaches and enjoy the true beauty of the Monterey Peninsula.

Guests will delight in this 3,000+ square-foot Pebble Beach home, loca
neighborhood_overview:
Coast Estate invites you to experience the beautiful Monterey Peninsula and California Central Coast. The are is world renown for spectacular coastlines, unique coastal communities, and rich marine life. Coast Estate specializes in Luxury Vacation Rentals in Big Sur, Carmel, Carmel Highlands, Carmel Valley, Pacific Grove, Pebble Beach, Monterey and Seaside.

Pebble Beach is more than any Golfer could ever dream of, with eight Championship golf courses. Locals and visitors alike flock to 17 Mile Drive, one of the best-known and most spectacular scenic drives in the world. Cypress Point Club, Monterey Peninsula Dunes Golf Course, Pebble Beach Golf Links, Poppy Hills, Spyglass Hill Golf Course and The Links at Spanish Bay are all within 10 to 15 minutes driving distance from any point in the Del Monte Forest.

There are also miles of hiking, bicycling and equestrian trails that wind through the scenic Del Monte Forest. Fine dining is available at The Lodge at P
host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

You may see MaryJane's 149 Guest Reviews from the original Host Account.

name: Cheerful 3-bedroom home 2 blocks from the beach
description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun. Located less than 2 blocks from one of the most picturesque coastlines on the Central Coast of California. Easy stroll to the beach. Less than a mile to all the shoppes and restaurants. Pacific Grove offers a small-town secure feel. This spacious and tastefully decorated home is perfect for a family or a couple. The open concept floor plan provides plenty of space for the whole family.
We are walking distance to Lovers Point..

The space
The house is bright and spacious! The kitchen is large with a center island. The house features both a formal living room and a large TV room with an l shape sectional sofa. The house cable Comcast TV and internet service. The master bedroom suite is upstairs and very private. It has a separate desk area for working. The other two bedrooms are located on the main floor and share a full bathroom with a tub and shower combination. The back yard is completely

name: Pebble Beach 3 bedroom 4 bath plus Bonus Room close to the Ocean and Golf
description:
Welcome to Pebble Beaches Hacienda by the Sea

Enjoy the Pebble Beach lifestyle in this classic Mediterranean, just minutes to golf, beaches, ocean and walking trails.


Located In desirable Country Club West on a spacious corner lot overlooking a greenbelt across the street.  Truly warm and inviting, this home has been lovingly maintained.

The 2,850+ square foot home has a casual elegance, with spacious entertainment areas, a gourmet chef's kitchen, and outdoor courtyards filled with flowers. 

The home features a grand, high beam ceiling living room with cozy fireplace, separate dining room, a spacious kitchen with limestone countertops and an adjoining breakfast room. 

There are three (3) bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, plus a bonus room / office and full bathroom on the main floor making this a perfect golf retreat.

This house features:

 5 Large Flat Screen Smart T.V.'s

Fire Pit

neighborhood_overview: NA
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

description:
The space
Coral Oasis

Located within a half a mile to the coast, this beautifully detailed 3BR/2.5BA Pebble Beach home offers the best of indoor and outdoor living. From the sprawling front courtyard to the private side patio with a fireplace and brick oven, an unforgettable stay awaits at this serene retreat.

Carmel and Pacific Grove offer shops, sightseeing, and world-renowned golf within a short drive of the home, and Pebble Beach's array of eateries are less than 1 mile away.

LIVING AREAS

Hardwood floors stretch out in the expansive, window-lined living room, while a gas fireplace adds warmth on cool days.

Sink into the couch and matching love seat and play a game of chess, or simply relax with a movie on the flat-screen TV.

KITCHEN & DINING

With custom wood cabinetry and granite countertops, the gourmet kitchen is a highlight of the home's charming interior.

name: Beach Oasis - Step to Sand  & Amazing Ocean View
description:
Kick back and relax on the couch and enjoy the breathtaking California Coastal Ocean Views. This home offers everything you need for a short or long-term stay. Newly renovated with stylish modern furniture. Highend Nectar Memory Foam queen-size mattress will ensure you a sweet and sound sleep. The home is just a few steps away from the beach. The window in the living room has a direct view of the ocean. A fully equipped and spacious kitchen and dining room will allow you to enjoy nice meals...

The space
Tranquil and peaceful home with an amazing ocean view. It has everything you need for a long-term or short-term stay. The kitchen is fully equipped which allows you to cook a gourmet meal.

Guest access
You'll have full, private access to the entire unit.
neighborhood_overview: Very calm and peacful neighborhood. This home is half block from the beach. You get ocean breeze if you open the windows.
host_about:
I am a working professional in Silicon Valley with a passion for interior design and the hospitality industry. Since 2017, I joined Airbnb as a host and managed my first Airbnb property. Ever since then, I have never stopped creating more and more unique homes for my Airbnb guests. Up to this point, we are offering more than 18 properties in the Bay Area and California Coastal area. Each property has its unique interior design and furniture layout. My goal for each property is to provide the most comfortable stays and amazing experience for all of my guests.  

When I travel, I always stay at Airbnb properties. I personally have very high expectations when staying away from home and I hope all my properties meet yours, knowing you are traveling away from your home. My team members include my partner, Carrie, a customer service crew, a cleaning crew and a repair / handyman crew. They are on call 7-days a week at your service. We strive to exceed expectations to all of our guests with the utmost respect and respond. We will ensure each property is thoroughly cleaned with enhanced cleaning protocols, and with fresh bed sheets, towels, and bath rugs upon your arrival. 

I hand picked all of the furniture, bed sheets and kitchen equipment for each of our properties. I want to make sure everything my guests use is high quality with a unique style to allow them fully enjoy the space, because my guests deserve the best!

I am also an active member of Airbnb.org which is a non-profit organization started by the founders of Airbnb. In a daily basis, I donate a certain percentage of my revenue from each guest's booking to Airbnb.org. Our mission is to unlock the power of sharing space, resources, and support in times of needs! We partner with the worldwide communities to open housing in emergencies in order to  provide shelters for people who lost their homes. 

Thank you! My team and I look forward to hosting you in the near future!

description:

Quite a few impressive golf courses from Pacific Grove Golf Links (walk able from unit) to Black Horse/Bayonet (20 min drive) to the highly esteemed Pebble Beach Golf Courses on 17 mile drive. There is one step at the porch landing and one step down to the back bedroom. Back bedroom also has a low ceiling.

name: NEW! Breezy Monterey Apt: Walk to Downtown & Beach
description:
Discover the rich history, coastal beauty, and world-famous seafood of Monterey from this bright 2-bedroom, 1-bath vacation rental. Complete with a fully equipped kitchen, Smart TV, fireplace, and 2 workstations, this vibrant apartment offers the ideal home base for your extended stay. Take advantage of the proximity to downtown where numerous restaurants and shops await. Then, visit iconic attractions, including the renowned Monterey Bay Aquarium, and soak in some vitamin D at Del Monte Beach!

The space
30-Night Minimum | Free WiFi | Pet Friendly w/ Fee | <1 Mi to Beach

Perfect for a month-long friends excursion or an extended family vacation, this cozy-chic apartment provides the essential comforts and prime proximity for an effortless California getaway!

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Twin Bed | Living Room: Sleeper Sofa

HOME HIGHLIGHTS: Smart TV, fireplace, dining table, 2 desk workspaces, walk-in shower
KITCHEN: Moder

name: Charming Cottage by the Sea
description:
Welcome to Pacific Grove's Marine Way!

Located in the ocean front neighborhood of Lover's Point, this charming cottage boasts spectacular views. There are crashing waves over coastal rocks, spouting whales, sailboats, sea otters, sea birds and colorful sunsets all from the living room window. 

Recently remodeled, the kitchen has soft close cabinetry and granite counter tops. The bathrooms boasts a soaker tub for relaxing at the end of the day. The laundry room is in the garage. This is coastal living for the carefree heart!


Your hosts have provided the services of Carmel Coast Estate, Inc a locally owned and operated full service Real Estate and Property Management company. Your Property Managers are available by cellular phone, text messaging and email during your visit.

Here at Carmel Coast Estate, we take every measure to ensure the cleanliness of our fully furnished homes. We clean our homes with hospital grade, environmen
neighborhood_overview:
Coast Estate invites you to experience the beautiful Monterey Peninsula and California Central Coast. The are is world renown for spectacular coastlines, unique coastal communities, and rich marine life. Coast Estate specializes in Luxury Vacation Rentals in Big Sur, Carmel, Carmel Highlands, Carmel Valley, Pacific Grove, Pebble Beach, Monterey and Seaside.

Local residents and visitors alike refer to Pacific Grove as “America’s last Hometown” and the “Butterfly Capital of California”, due to the annual migration of the Monarch butterflies. Pacific Grove is known for well kept Victorian homes and amazing seascapes along the scenic Sunset Drive.

Asilomar State Beach offers visitors beach and coast trail walks and a short, accessible boardwalk loop through the Asilomar Dunes Natural Preserve. The Point Pinos Lighthouse is the oldest continuously operating lighthouse on the West Coast and may be toured in the afternoon.

host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

You may see MaryJane's 149 Guest Reviews from the original Host Account.

name: Beach Cottage with Ocean Peek-a-View for 30 days
description:
This tasteful cottage is located in the coveted Beach Tract neighborhood of Pacific Grove - 1 block from the ocean, 1 mile to Pacific Grove’s downtown, 1.5 miles to the Monterey Bay Aquarium, and 2.5 miles to 17-Mile Drive and Pebble Beach.

The space
The cottage has two bedrooms, each bedroom furnished with new Casper mattresses. There is one full bathroom which includes apartment-sized washer and dryer. The family room as a peek-a-view of the ocean as well as a gas fireplace. The sunroom is furnished with an office space. The family room and master bedroom have SmartTVs installed - there is no cable, but guest may log into their streaming accounts. The kitchen is outfitted with everything you’ll need make a favorite meal or enjoy a nice cup of coffee, BUT does not have a dishwasher or garbage disposal.

Guest access
Guest will have access to the entire home and parking spaces in the driveway, but will not have access to the garage and on

name: Cozy Cannery Row
description:
Park your car and walk for a couple of days. Nearly everything on Cannery Row, Fisherman's Wharf, downtown and the Aquarium are all a short walk. This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.
This is a very cozy and small 1 bedroom apartment unit. Think of a nice King Suite with full kitchen and some ocean view.

The space
The total space is approx 500 square feet and is cozy and adequate for your stay.
PLEASE BE AWARE THAT THE HARDWARE ON BEDROOM WINDOW IS BROKEN BY A PRIOR GUEST AND BACKORDERED. THE WINDOW REMAINS CRACKED OPEN BY A COUPLE OF INCHES. IT IS NOT A SAFETY CONCERN.

Guest access
There is a shared deck with another unit outside of your entry door.

Other things to note
There are 2 flights of stairs.

Truly unique getaway
